First of all organizing the tours was made easy wit quick replies from Surya. We prepaid for everything with paypal which was great and very convenient. "Norman" was always on time and where he was supposed to be. He took us any where we wanted and all of the tours had great flexibility (it was too hot so we left the beach early to do some shopping which was fine). His english was good. The vehicle was in good condition and the air conditioning worked well. Overall just a really great experience. We will definitely book again!

Fantastic. I purchased a Sunset tour from Sun Tours through Groupon and decided to look on their website and see what else they offered that I might be able to do on my trip to Bali. I saw the Dolphin Lodge tour and rounded up friends to see who else wanted to come. I email Surya and he was happy to book us all in and meet me at my hotel to take payment as the website credit card one would not work. Both the tours were great. When I needed to change dates due to people being unwell, Surya was straight onto it and very obliging and helpful. Drivers for both tours were very nice and had good knowledge - especially the Sunset tour (Uluwatu and Jimbaran), Would definitely use this company again.

The Organiser!. If you're going to Bali and either don't know what to do or have specific things in mind, then Surya is the go-to man. And if you really have no idea of what to do, he is full of suggestions of interesting places and activities that will be sure to satisfy your needs. He does all this with an ever present smile on his face and nothing is too hard for him to do. He has an array of great drivers available and his costs are always reasonable as well. Highly recommend his services if you want to go on any type of tour or activity whilst in Bali, give him a go and I guarantee you'll be happy
Great experience. Did two tours and both were perfect, no problems at all! Surya was always fast and willing to help and solve any doubt or problem. Thanks!

Bali sun tours. We hired our driver 4 the day and he was awesome his name is Nyoman Widana and we r gr8ful and thankful that he was such a gr8 driver with good english took us 2 wea we wantd 2 go n his own gr8 places 2 take us very funni, kind, honest and humble highly recommend thus service 2 any1 who needs reliable transport.

Just what we asked for. My family of 6 have just got back from our Bali holiday and was very happy with the service we were provided by the team. We asked to be picked up and dropped off at another hotel and nothing was too much trouble at all. We had fun along the way although I felt bad for our driver Nyoman or we called him Norman as he had to answer all my mums questions about Bali and the 3 little boys in the back of the car. He took us anywhere we wanted him to although we had booked the romantic tour. I knew we wouldn't enjoy the temple so as we requested he didn't take us there. He found us a lovely place for lunch which we visited another 3 times. We asked if he cow;d drop us off early so the kids could get home to the pool and it was only smiles. The water sports was pretty full on with lots of people but we enjoyed the sea walker and got it for the group on price of $49 each. The guy there was good as he wasn't pushy at all, they understood that we had 3 little kids under 5 so hard to do it all. I would recommend this tour to anyone. Its also a great way to get transferred as there is that time that you are in no mans land.

Thanks for a great experience!. I booked 3 days worth of activities and airport transfers (Monkey Rafting, Cycling, and Private day of touring) during our recent trip to Bali. Really could not ask for any better!The trips themselves were terrific, well planned,fun and interesting and we will be booking more tours when we go back again next year.Also thanks to Agung for your surprise on our trip back to the airport, and all the prompt communication during booking.

Feeling pressured. We brought a voucher off one of the deals in Sydney and boy were we disappointed , we were told we were going to the water sports park and we said we did not want to do that as it was not on our " Romantic Package " , how romantic would it be to go to the beach and be with 4,000 people trying to go on boats , bananas and para sailing. The driver was not that happy because he would not get a kick back ...... Every were else we went he tried to take as places HE wanted , when we said no , we just go back home to our hotel , he said he was happy about that , all he kept telling us about was that he owned the company and the 4 vans. And prior to that he was a farmer...... Blah blah blah...... would not recommend this place if Rio was the driver or the so called owner....

Awesome!!. We booked the tour using a voucher from scoopon, a big thank you to our driver Nyoman we had an absolute blast! Also a big thanks to surya who replied to our emails within minutes. When your next in bali make sure you hit up bali sun tours.Thanks guys see you in march

Great Service and peace of mind. We had purchased a voucher on our deal for an evening tour. The driver picked us up on time and showed us the sites. Awesome time at Bali. Bali Sun Tours went out of its way to satisfy us couple. Reliable, prompt, friendly, professional. We booked Bali Sun Tours through groupon. It worked out to be around $25aud for an Ubud private tour including Luwak coffee, ubid rice paddies, the monkey forest and the art village. The driver was due to pick us up from out hotel at 830am, he was there and ready to go at 820am. He spoke excellent english and was actually from Ubud so he had alot of local knowledge of the area.His driving was safe and reliable and he didnt appear to be speeding at any stage. We left bags in the van at each place and he stayed with them for us. He also had a very friendly demanour.Our tour was meant to go from 830-230 but he told us that there was no other bookings for the day and we ended up getting back to our hotel at 430pm and he didnt charge us any extra. I'd recommend using Bali Sun Tours for anyone wishing for a great day out with reliable and safe service.

Excellent Service. We would like to thank Nyoman Widana for showing us Bali. He was always on time and went out of his way to organise tours and also show us the Balinese way of life. I would highly recommend Nyoman who was very helpful and patient with Rita (80 years old) He got her some lovely flowers for her birthday and also a small stool to aid her with getting in and out of cars. Thank you Nyoman your help and consideration was greatly appreciated. I would recommend Bali Sun Tours and would definitely book Nyoman on our next trip to Bali.

Amazing friend. Me and my boyfriend recently shared our first holiday together in Bali. We saw a groupon voucher for a tour with Bali sun tours and decided to go for it. He will forever be our friend and each time we return we will be sure to book with him again.

Fantastic tour, very friendly!. We traveled to Bali for a short romantic holiday, we booked a temple tour through Groupon with Bali Sun Tours. Brilliant from start to finish. Even before i even got to Bali i knew this would be a great company, and they didn't prove me wrong.Organising 2 tours was fun and easy and they even made the tour to my choosing meaning i get to have my own tour made the way i wanted.Our driver/tour guide was OKE and was the happiest man i have met.He was a great person to have even when we was driving for 2.5hrs from Ubud down to the south part of bali he never lost the smile.When i go back i have already said i will book again and ask for OKE and we said we will all go out for dinner and Arak next time we meet cause thats how friendly it was.Thank you once again

Recommended 110%. Surya is incredible!! I would have sent him 50 emails to book various tours and everytime he replied to me within a maximum of 15 minutes. Such an easy stress free process! Thank you Surya!

For the best driver in Bali - OKA OKA OKA!!!. We spent about two weeks in Bali and had fantastic time.. I got recommended Oka from a friend of mine who had just been to Bali and told me i HAVE to use him.So i did.Best decision of our lives.. Picked us up at mid night from the airport no worries (even had the sign with our name on it). Was friendly and polite straight away, shoed away the pesky taxi drivers trying to take advantage of you when you first come out the doors of the airport..Over the course of ten days we used him prob 5 of those days on and off, he was sooo easy to deal with, very knowledgeable of places to go or places not to go. nothing was ever to much trouble everything is always 'ok' with Oka!he is happy to wait around for you to finish dinner or whatever it is you are doing.. or if you invite him in for a beer or dinner will normally happily pull up a seat and have a chat!MAKE SURE you get Oka to take you to where the "locals eat" its called a Warung. omg some of the best food you will ever eat... each one specialises in different things depending on what part of Bali you are in and he knows the best ones and you won't get sick!! Suckling pig mmmmmmm.i could go on for ever here but i will cut it short all in all Oka really made our holiday AMAZING with out him i feel we would have had the amazing cultural experience we did. THANK YOU OKA xx

Great! . We had a great day out on this tour and our driver Oka was fantastic! Would definitely recommend him and would use him again when we go back to bali. It was nice to see a different part of bali other than bogans in bingtang singlets.

Cultural Experience. I wanted to see the real Bali, not be stuck in a 5 star resort and i feel that i got a chance to do that. I continuously asked my Guide Nyoman heaps of questions and he was only to happy to share with me his knowledge of Bali and its culture. I felt safe at all times and I don't think i would have got the same experience if I had of hired a random driver to drive me around. Its the little thinks like letting me know how to behave around monkeys and which hand to use for purification. Its always hard for someone who wants to respect another culture to feel comfortable because you worry so much about making mistakes...but i felt fine. I went on the Luminous tour and the Ubud Tour. The Barong dance was cool, the temples were amazing and I loved the restaurant at the volcano. The food was lovely and so inexpensive. The next trip we went to the monkey forest and to Ubud and we also looked at the process of making Batik...Its my first time to Bali so Nyoman helped me to understand local custom and that's what i'm there for to learn.....so Wow and that's all i can say. Totes recommend. Do take a camera, sunblock, water and a hat and be prepared to be amazed

Great Experience. Wonderful People. Hi! I am Rahul from Pune, India. My Friend Shreekar and myself (2 families) had been to Bali between 13th to 21st Jun, 14. It was a wonderful experience. Our local travel and site seeing was arranged by Bali Sun Tours. Mr Surya, a wonderful person, with his also wonderful team (Wayan, Aari). They took care of us very well. We stayed in Kuta for 4 days and had a tour of Central and North Bali and then stayed in Nusa Dua for 2 days and experienced South Bali. Mr Surya and team, without any complaining were there with us for the entire day till late evening. He planned the tour well. We really enjoyed the tour. We felt lot of warmth with the team and were feeling like our family members at the east end of the globe. We also invite them to visit another beautiful place on the earth - India. We recommend to all - visit to Bali with Bali Sun Tours. Great Experience. Wonderful People.

Bali Sun Tour - Sunset Tour. We (4 adults, 2 children ages 4 &7) went on this tour. The length of this tour (about 5 hours) suited both the older and younger people in our group. Surya kindly arranged this tour for us on short notice and Wayan was our guide. He was very friendly and provided us with some basic background information. This tour included a visit to Uluwatu temple (which included a kecak dance performance) and dinner on the beach at Ganesh Cafe (Seafood restaurant), Jimbaran. The location of the temple (on a cliff) was amazing! The temple itself was closed off to tourists so we walked around the temple grounds (not very large) took pictures of the astounding views and monkeys. Be sure to keep your belongings in your vehicle if possible (sunglasses etc.) as these monkeys take whatever they can, edible or not. We saw one with a coin purse it had pinched from a fellow tourist!The view from the outdoor theatre overlooking the ocean was breathtaking. We were told that on a less cloudy day, we would have had a better view of the sun setting. We paid a little less than USD 10 for each adult (half price for kids) to watch the kecak dance (this is in addition to the $2 we paid to enter the temple grounds). The kecak dance started off on a serious note and quickly became farcical after the second act. The kecak chorus was quite unusual and kept the show moving along. After the show ended, we made our way to Jimbaran for dinner. If you feel cold with wind blowing, do bring along a light jacket/sweater so you can comfortably enjoy dinner on the beach. The ordering process was a bit chaotic. The red snapper we ordered (sweet sour style) was tasty. The rest of it was average. The seafood fried rice was cold when it arrived and the prawns were over-cooked. I wouldn't opt go back to this restaurant even though the fish was quite good. Wayan was great! I hope to take another tour with Bali Sun Tours when I return to Bali.

Best tour guides in bali!. My friend Crystina and I recently travelled to bali and was recommended to use bali sun tours! I would recommend bali sun tours to anyone who is thinking about a holiday in bali and will defiantly use bali sun tours again!

couldnt be better!. Mayan, our tour guide, provided us with excellent services , and kindly answered all my stupid questions. He also took us to beautiful places with a reasonable price. I will definitely hire him again next time when i visit Bali again.

Quick, hassle-free & enjoyable. Went to Bali for business and thought that I should also include some leisure activities while I'm there. Knowledgeable guides and personalised service. Will definitely ring them up again if I do ever drop by Bali again, be it for a business or leisure. Thanks Bali Sun Tours! It was memorable!. Agree that Bali Safari and Marine Park is a great destination for rare animals because not only had I great recreation place, we also get many new knowledge from educational shows. Having a “tiger package” with Bali Sun Tours, I had totally satisfying a full day trip at Bali Safari and Marine Park. My friends and I get crazy to take photos even at entrance because there is a lobby called Lobby Barong that’s just so Balinese :DOur steps stopped to take photos again in front of Hanoman Stage, statues gallery of Ramayana. Sure there are statues of Hanoman itself, Rahwana and others. We didn’t go inside because I insisted to take a safari tour by bus, of course. Luckily I had sat near the window so I could clearly what is outside. A young guide started to tell us about animals living there. I felt amazed seeing three zebras coming near to our bus. Then, we see rhinoceros, a sunbathing hippopotamus lol, tigers, and other wildlife creatures that have their uniqueness. “We are no longer in Bali, here is Africa” my friend joked. But yeah, it showed us the riches of wildlife rare animals either in Indonesia or in Africa. After that, we were gladly welcomed by professional elephant trainers. Both of the elephant and trainer were ready to show! I heard so many “wow” when the elephants fulfilled its trainer’s command. Then, we were having lunch at Uma restaurant, luckily we came on Sunday then we could watch traditional dance performance. In short, I enjoyed my tour in Bali Safari Marine Park that ended with sightseeing fresh water aquarium where we could see thousand fish. Thanks Bali Sun Tours﻿ for giving the great and worth scheduled package!
GREAT EXPERIENCE. booked the dolphin tour thru here easy to deal with very friendly and a great tour would highly recommend.

He's the best!. My family and I adore him! Made use of his services twice. First time I was there with my girlfriend. The 2nd time I came to Bali with my family, with no regrets. I'm looking forward to visiting Bali the 3rd time and I'm definitely going to contact him again. Cheers!

All guud in Ubud. Wayan Murdo very knowledgeable, friendly, funny, spiritual and best driver in all of Bali. Excellent Service by Nyoman and Surya. My partner and I had such a wonderful experience with Bali Sun Tour. I highly recommend this tour agency. Our guide Nyoman was so accommodative and hospitable. Dolphin Interactive Tour. My girlfriend and I went on the tour in January 2014. I dealt with Surya via email and I must say he was absolutely awesome in responding very quickly. I would highly recommend Bali Sun Tours for any tour in Bali. We will definitely be going with them again next time we visit Bali.

Best Driver in Bali!. I can not recommend Wayan Murda highly enough. Wayan has had so much experience in the tourism industry in Bali and knows all the best places to go - from restaurants to shops. I have always felt very safe when driving with him and my children love him. If you need a good driver - make sure you ask for Wayan Murda!

Best driver and tour guide in Bali. We went to Bali for our honeymoon and it was our first time visiting Bali. We plan on having many more holidays in Bali and we will make sure we only use Wayan as he deffinately made our trip unforgettable.

The best time with the best people. My husband and I went to Bali for our first time (from Australia) for our honeymoon. I could not of had a more fantastic time! The staff from Bali Sun Tours were absolutely beautiful and I couldn't of asked for a better introduction into Bali. We are returning again and will definitely be in contact with bali sun tours as we believe they are more to us than just a business but great friends. I highly recommend you check them outThank you so much

absolutely fantastic. My partner and I went overseas for the first time to bali in December and we absolutely loved going through Bali Sun Tours for all our activities we planned to do. All members of the team were lovely and made you feel comfortable and at home in Bali, Surya helped me to organize and pre plan some of our activities before we went via email and facebook and always messaged me to offer assistance to make our trip the best it could be. He gave us good deals on everything we did and every single activity we did ran smoothly. The one time we booked NOT through Bali Sun Tours was the one thing we didnt like, so continued to book through their company. MY friends who were in bali at the same time as us were booking through the street stalls everyone back home tells you to book at and they were being ripped off on comparison to us, and said their tours were no where near as good as ours. Surya is an excellent host for Bali, so cheerful and genuinely wanting to provide the best for all his customers. I couldnt recommenced bali sun tours more, making sure my friends and my parents who come to Bali this year go through this company!!!

Thank you Bali Sun Tours!!!. I travelled all the way from US to Bali last December and I say that was the best decision in my life, period. I had so much fun with my friends doing rafting at Telaga Waja River. When I was there, I felt like I found the secret beauty of Bali. The forest was so thick and green with vines hanging down the tall trees, falling leaves, bird chirping, total opposite of all the crowd and the buzz in US. The price was reasonable and I had a river guide who was the very definition of friendliness with an air of professionalism in his every rafting advices and guidelines. He provided us with waterproof bag and towel too. The safety equipment was international standardized, added with insurance cover hence I could put my worries aside. We ended the day with tasty buffet. We went back to our hotel completely merry for we tamed the wild dragon on the best river in Bali! Thank you Bali Sun Tours!!!

Bali water fun. I had so much fun in Bali last December because Bali Sun Tours was a great help arranging my trip. My most favorite part was the water adventure on my 2nd day. We did parasailing, banana boat, and jet ski. I wanted to do snorkeling at first, but the staff advised me not to because they were worried of my health, so I agreed with activities that did not include submerging myself under water. I was really thankful for the advice, if not I wouldn't be able to enjoy the last 3 days. Thank you for caring, Bali Sun Tour, I really appreciated it.The parasailing was so much fun, when I was on the sky I saw the beauty of Bali, the vast blue ocean surrounding the brown sandy shore, that was a breath-taking view to take. The blazing sun was a nice compliment for the chilling ocean breeze so I was comfortable up there. It seemed that Bali Sun Tours chose the right time to be that high. That was awesome and really thoughtful!The banana boat and jet ski were enjoyable. The instructor explained how to drive the jet ski very clearly and even tested us whether we understood his explanation or not, a detail man with detail explanation. 3 hours on the beach was not enough because Bali Sun Tours made our holiday so enjoyable. The staffs were so helpful too right from the very beginning when we were scheduling up to when the driver took us back to my hotel.Bali Sun Tours gave me a marvelous holiday in Bali. Fantastic holiday agent! Please help with my next trip too!
Always Amazing. The Team is very Devoted to do their Best, even in last minute Bookings, They are really amazing and always will be my first choice in Bali

I got a dolphin buddy in Bali!!!. I spent 40 minutes in the water playing with my new dolphin buddy and I owe Bali Sun Tours for that thrilling and super fun experience!! The water was clear and clean, the dolphin is cute (in a dolphin way XD), and I had several trainers watching over me and my buddies. Since I was not a good swimmer I clung to the dolphin all over~~ Best first hand experience ever!! And I really liked to locker, my belonging was safe there and its capacity amazed me I could shove my backpack and shoes in. Thank you Bali Sun Tours!!
best of best. if you come to bali no perfect if you no booking some tour in BALI SUN TOURwith Surya (always smile and helping)with low budged you can go arround bali happy tour :)

Wonderful :). We love our stay in bali, Surya is a fantastic guide, always with a smile, very friendly and tell us the best things to do in that beautiful island.We would like to come back and travel with bali sun tours :)Kisses from portugal

Brilliant Team. One of the best experiences in Bali was with Bali Sun Tours. The teamof driver guide was fantastic and you will see everything you want and must see on this beautiful island. Safe and licensed company, great comfortable tour equipment. Their English very well and is extremely flexible - you can use their services while you are in Bali. HIGHLY Recommend this company.They took us and friends of us around the island before and after our visit; they all recommend him wholeheartedly. Not only to us, to many of their customers. We love you Bali Sun Tours.

Awesome Rio, Awesome Bali. Rio was our guide for our four days stay in bali and we were made to feel at home. I was there with my sun and wife for a short break and Rio made us feel simply at home. He was full of ideas and was very knowledgable about matters. He spoke from his heart and was very genuine. You hardly meet sincere drivers and guides these days on trips. What I can say is that we made a good friend in Rio and thanks bali sun tours for wanting us to come back to Bali again. Rio we will see you soon. Don't go missing!!,,

Don't go with anyone else - Rio is the best. We spent a few days with Rio earlier this year. After the first day we realised what a gem he is. By the end of the holiday we were turning down free transfers from our hotel in favour of hiring him instead. He is knowledgeable, unbelievably friendly, flexible, accommodating and a fantastic representation of Bali as a whole. Friends that have hired him have said exactly the same thing. You get picked up as a client, and get dropped off as a friend. Can't recommend highly enough.

awesome and frindly tour guide in bali. this the most welcome tour guide !! and really helpful we will use your company every time we back to bali !! your service is 5 stars all the adventure and activity we try with you guys ,.......is excellent and great price too !! we will recommended you to all my friends !

Service with a smile. I would recomend Bali Sun Tours to anybody travelling to Bali. Have dealt with Surya for over 4 years. Nothing is to hard, prices are good. Anytime, anywhere, Surya is your one stop tour man.

A wonderful tour guide.. I contacted Bali Sun Tours requesting a quote to take my mum and my pregnant self on a day of shopping. Within minutes I received an email back with a price $15 cheaper than my resort quoted, so we confirmed the booking, the driver would pick us up from Seminyak at 9am. It was pouring rain, the driver was early and greeted us with an umbrella so we didn't get wet. He introduced himself as Made.We got in the very comfy A/C van and explained we didn't really know where to go for shopping, so we'll leave it to him. Made suggested quite a few places including Geneva, matahari, kuta art market, discovery, and took us to quite a few others along the way and also took us for lunch @ Bubba Gumps. Nothing was at all to much trouble, being pregnant, I wanted to look at baby stuff, Made even walked me to the baby sections of the department stores to show me !Made was obliging, courteous and his English was 10/10. He also took us to a bank to exchange money along the way.....bringing us back to our villa at 4.30 via Seminyak square to pick up some dresses that I had made a few days earlier to accommodate my expanding belly.I would recommend this driver to anyone visiting Bali, he certainly looked after us! Amy and Vicki Beveridge

Awesome, personal Service by Surya. I organised a trip to swim with the Dolphins thru Bali Sun Tours before we arrived in Bali, I found Surya's to be very helpful and was able to ensure that our group was able to do this tour together. When we arrived in Bali Surya met us at our accommodation the day before our tour, we all found him to be a fantastic, happy and helpful person. Our trip out was comfortable and the driver was pretty easy going, it was a beautiful opportunity for us to all interact with such an intelligent and gentle creature......I would highly recommend this tour to anyone. We also had Surya organise a boat cruise for us that was also well organised and we all had an awesome day. Surya is an asset to Bali Sun Tours and anyone who is interested in booking a tour should use Surya to ensure that you enjoy your holiday to its fullest.

Fantastic service. Met Surya last year after he organised some tours for us. Nothing was a hassle for him. Great tour guide and had lots of suggestions for new things for us to try as we have been to bali quite a few times. Called in and saw him again this year, only too pleased to help. Thanks Surya, it was great to have someone over there we can rely on and trust. We will see you in a couple of weeks again!!!
excellent. We use Surya everytime we go to Bali...his Bali Sun Tours is excellent and we don't bother using anyone else... Highly recommended...

Surya,Number ONE tour guide in Bali!. Bali Sun Tours is headed up by Surya, a friendly Indonesian man who has a passion for meeting tourists and helping them make the most of their holiday ( his smile is contagious)!Surya is a great bloke who knows his way around Bali,he will take you and your family to all the top spots all at a good, reasonable price. Surya speaks very good English and nothing is to much trouble.Definitely worth while to look Surya up at Bali Sun Tours if your heading to Bali for a holiday, I can highly recommend.

Knowledgable tour advice from the nicest bloke. Tour advisors are a dime a dozen in Kuta. The thing that puts Bali Sun Tours ahead is it's staff. We dealt with Surya who not only knew his tours backwards but was the dead set nicest fella you'll meet. Very friendly and nothing was ever too hard and at the same time nothing was ever a trouble. Call in and say Hi at least for me at the tour desk at Santika Premiere Beach Hotel.

Genuine. My family and I had Surya organise our tours when we stayed at the Santika in Kuta. He was lovely and made us feel really welcome. He defiantly helped us in enjoying our stay and was genuine when organising tours and have us realistic prices. Well defiantly be going back to see him again next time we stay in Bali.

Bali Sun Tours - exactly what the name says, tours under the Bali sun. We've had Surya organise our tours for a couple of years now for good reason. He knows his tours and gives honest opinions of what he thinks are their good or bad points. He does all he can to help and actually cares whether he gives you value for money or not. He's a rare gem in the industry and we were lucky to find him and he's now an automatic choice when we land there.
Best tours organiser!. Best tours organiser in Bali! Such a helpful Fantastic easy worry free way to book your tours. Always has great deals : ) would re comment highly!

Thoughtful, authentic, engaged experience. Wayan Juli is an amazing host, and on our drive through the Kedewatan village was explaining the community structures and cultures of Bali in a way that is personal and authentic. You can tell he is a kind person. More than that, he wants to share his life stories and knowledge with you, and is truly interested in helping those who visit here to understand the values and mentality of the beautiful Balinese people. It was a pleasure to spend time with him yesterday (5 Nov 2016). Wayan, many, many thanks for a wonderful conversation and lovely company. I wish you all the best for your family. With warmest regards, Tien

Smooth organisation & super nice & reliable driver. We had booked three day tours with Be Balinese Tour during our stay in Bali and can definitely recommend them. Wayan Juli is extremely well-organized and replies to e-mails VERY quick and 100% clear. So in comparison with all companies we wrote, Be Balinese convinced us already during the first few e-mail dialogues. Our driver Wayan Surya was also extremely nice, super reliable and on top of it so much fun! We had great conversations with him and laughed a lot! Also, we can definitely recommend his driving skills as he drives with great routine and care. His car was perfectly clean every day!Also, Be Balinese in comparison to many other companies offering this service is a relatively small company where all drivers know each other and they seem to have a good relationship towards each other. Also a great reason for supporting them!

Just amazing Tour with Be Balinese. We - Two couples Travelling through Bali - booked the guided tour with Wayan around North of Ubud. Wayan is driving a Very modern, clean, big and save car!This is very important if you stay the whole day in this car and drive around the sights of Bali.Wayan as our guide and founder of be Balinese is just great!He loves his job and shows you all the spots you want to see or where he thinks they might interest you!We fell very welcome due to the fact Wayan was able to answer all our questions in a smart way!We really enjoyed the day with him and got the chance to learn and see a lot of Bali!We will book be Balinese again and can recommend it all of you!All the best from us Germans!

Everything was fine!. We planed a tour through bali with a few hotels and different places we wanted to see and the transports and some visits of waterfalls, temples, etc. were planed and done from "Be Balinese Tour" on the ways to other hotels. Everything was fine. We can not say one thing which could be improved. Overall: Nice driver! Good prices! Always on time! Trying to help with everything! Very polite! Etc...Best regards, Kevin

So much done in one day!. We had a wonderful time today with Ketut Taro. He was a lovely guide and took use to many more places than we expected. We loved the coffee plantations so would recommend if you love coffee or would like to try the luwak coffee. Ketut's english was very good and he very friendly and happy guy. Thanks again!

Just perfect !. We spent 3 wonderful days with Wayan Juli on customized tours around Ubud.Everything was perfect and the whole family loved him; he was polite and attentive with the Grandma ; he answered all the questions of the mother about Balinese culture; he played with our little girls (5 years old, who does not speak English but still asks when we will meet Wayan again) as the mother took countless photos and carried her on his back when she did not want to walk any more; without forgetting the dad for whom Wayan is by far the best guide we had during our 29 days in Bali.Bref, nous sommes unanimes, Wayan Juli est un chauffeur extrêmement attentif et prudent; un guide compétent et flexible qui s'est adapté à toutes nos demandes et changements de dernière minute et un jeune homme honnête, avec le cœur sur la main et digne de confiance. Nous le recommandons donc sans hésiter et nous espérons retourner un jour à Bali pour continuer à visiter cette île magnifique et cette fois pas la peine de chercher un autre guide, ce sera Wayan.Thanks again for all these beautiful moments Sybille, Thomas, Romane and the Grandmother

Best Bali guide ever!. Thanks Ju gave us a wonderful day in Ubud.Me and my girls arrived in Bali, took Ju's airport pickup straight to Ubud, it feels really nice to see your name on the board as soon as you walk out the airport. On the way to Ubud even stop at the food vender center for us to have some munch. Ju is flexible and easy to communicate with, he listen to your need and try his best to answer you, very chilled and honest person.I recommend Ju to everyone who want to have a good trip in Bali:)

Amazing experience! (Must See!!). Be Balinese tours.. Our moment to treasure for a lifetime. We were greated by Wayan the most amazing and informative guide in Bali... At first approach we could see that he was professional and well suited.. We were taking on a 5 day tour of Bali with it's most breathetaking temples, Rice Fields, Forest and landscapes. Wayan's Knowledge was spot on ( like Bali Google )He took us though a calming and overwhelming Journey of the culture , kindess and purity of Bali a place where we can call heaven on earth...More than Words can express an experience worth a lifetime.. Wayan is also hard working ,Honest and has a very kind hearted..We definitely reccommend !! Marie and Keon !!!

Perfect. The organization was perfect, everything like planned, they are not only drivers but guides who keep explaning you the stories and backgrounds of all sights. We are very satisfied. We has some problema with the boat company but then Wayan helped us And sent a prívate car to pick us up from pandanbai.

Great guide for your Bali adventure!. We had 3 tours with Wayan Juli in June 2016, as well as airport pick up. We are very satisfied with the services he provided – starting from very clear communication and prompt response to messages, good driving skills and very comfortable car. Wayan Juli was a great tour guide – professional and friendly, fluent in English, very flexible with our itinerary, has good knowledge of Balinese culture and always took a great care of us. He was not available for the 4th tour we did in Bali, so he organized us his partner Ketut Ajus – who is also a great guide – taking great care of his clients, fluent in English and very flexible. Thanks Wayan Juli for making our vacation even more awesome and we would definitely recommend Be Balinese Tour to our friends! Jarune & Paulius

Traditional Tour of Bali in the area surrounding Ubud. We only did one day of touring on Bali. Wayan Juli showed us the temple highlights around Ubud. He is mild mannered and a great driver. His patience while I took a lot of photos was endless. He knows the area very well - what towns specialize in what crafts, where to walk around a private rice terrace away from the crowds, etc.His knowledge of the Hindu culture and Bali history is comprehensive. I extended our amount of time with him the day before. I only would have liked the tour to be slightly more organized, but I think that's the road system in Bali more than the tour. I've had a lot of enthusiastic tour guides, wayan juli is more soft spoken. It doesn't make it bad, just more Balinese. The island in general is calmer than most of our other destinations. This is an overall cultural interpretation of Bali and Be Balinese was also like that during our tour.We requested seeing lots of temples and he satisfied that as well as the rice terraces. I agree with the other reviewer that he should have cold water and clean wipes for his guests. The car was amazing - very new and clean. He offers sarongs for the temples and stays with you for the whole tour. Lastly Wayan Juli's English both written and spoken is the best we experienced on the island.

Nice to meet up again. We toured with Wayan 2 years ago. It was good meeting up with him again. He responds to my email and whatsapp requests promptly. His suggestion of eating at Lia Cafe was good too. He waited patiently while my husband snapped all the sunset photos at Tanah Lot. We look forward to meeting up with Wayan for our next visit to Bali. Maybe a Scoopy tour next?

Best Private Tour with a Bali Encyclopedia as a Guide cum Driver. 6 day tour with Be Balinese private tours is a treasure of memory. The tour vehicle, tour customised itinerary, Ketut (guide's explanation) and all with highest customer satisfaction. We are extremely pleased with Mr Ketut Ajus(Guide cum driver cum a Balinese friend) for his insightful explanation. Ketut is fantastic and he is mini encyclopedia of Bali. He knows Balinese places, routes, traditions, customs, ceremonies, heritage, religion and to do / not to do things. He is also an extremely talented photographer and took memorable family photos at all visited places as an evidential photo collage of Bali. He is punctual and safe driver.We are extremely satisfied & Great value for money.Devanand & family

Best guide we have ever had!. On our vacation in Bali of course we wanted to see as much as possible of this country. So we started to look for a guide who does private tours. We found Wayan Juli here on TripAdvisor and we can tell that that was the best decision we could have made! We contacted him on WhatsApp two days before we wanted to make our trip. We just told him the date and the places we wanted to see. He answered pretty quick and gave us all the information we needed - so we just had to confirm. On our one day trip we almost explored whole Bali. Wayan Juli picked us up with his nice car. He told us so much about the country, the culture, religion and the life in Bali. By the way, his English is great! All the information he has given were not told like a studied poetry, we had a great conversation with him so he could answer all the questions we had. It was so interesting to talk to him, so we can tell that now we know more about Bali than we would have ever known with an usual guide! He also joined us while visiting all the places and told us the meanings and histories of them. He gave us good advices and showed us markets and places where we could go shopping for good prices. He always waited patiently while we were walking around by ourselves no matter how long it took. All in one, he was the best guide we could have had! We definitively recommend to plan your Bali trip with him!

Dynamic team. I organized my wedding in Ubud - we had about 50 guests, half of them wanted us to help them with logistics and organize as well some day trips and visits. I used two companies - Be Baline was the best. We had 4 drivers overall, always neat, always on time, with varying levels of english but all of them enough to do the task at end (guide are obviously fluent). The prices were reasonable and fair. On my next trip to Bali I ll for sure call them again!!! Cheers!

No where and nothing was too much trouble.. We'd like to put another big thumbs up to Juli, our driver when we travelled to Bali again. Not only was he there waiting for us at the airport with his beaming smile, he also kept us informed about the things happening in Bali. From political issues like the and reclamation in Benoa Bay to Saraswati day and what to expect. We saw many different areas that we missed the last time. And even when we had to go find a special village in Bangli to pick up some instruments,....Juli made the whole trip seems so easy. Matur suksma, Juli.

The highlight of our week in Bali. We hired Wayan Juli for transport from the airport to our Ubud hotel (Alam Shanti) and for 2 full day tours of the island and transport to our Seminyak hotel (Courtyard Seminyak) on the second day. The 2 full day tours were easily the highlight of our week in Bali. We saw many sights and much beautiful scenery in the north, central, and southern parts of the island. On the first day, we saw Goa Gajah, Gunung Kawi, Tirta Empul, Kitamani Batur Volcano, and the Tegallalang rice fields. On the second day, we saw Pura Ulu Danu Bratan, Jatiluwih rice fields, Puru Tanah Lot, and Puru Lahur Ulu Watu.We found Wayan Juli to be a very nice, educated, and intelligent person, and he was always very patient, pleasant, considerate, and social. His English is excellent. He was always very willing to take numerous photos of our family, and he does take very good photos.His car is air conditioned and comfortable, and he is a very careful driver.I found his prices to be very reasonable. He didn't charge extra for longer days, although I did pay him extra for our second day, which turned out to be a 12 hour day for him.He was always very punctual and responded very quickly to all emails.

Thank you for two wonderful days on Bali, Kejut!. There are many offers for private tours on Bali. Be Balinese stuck out of the mass by seeming to be very authentic which was the reason why we contacted Mr Wayan Juli (the owner) for a tour. The correspondence was very professional and the next morning Mr Ketut Ajus was waiting for us at our hotel. Ketut is a very friendly, polite and funny guy with a nearly unlimited knowledge about Bali, its traditions, poeple's habits and everything else that comes with it. On top of that, he is a very safe driver which is quite a skill in balinese traffic. We had great conversations with him and it was rather like being with a friend than just with a tour guide. Ketut showed us the island through the eyes of a local, explained every temple, lake, village, vulcano and so on we went to in the utmost detail. He asked for our interests and even managed to take us to a Warung out in the country, where there were no tourists because we wanted to try "real" balinese food. This one of the best lunch we had during our whole time on Bali. Words cannot describe the beauty of the things he showed us and the perfect time and fun we had these two days. Sadly all things come to an end and the best things just seem never to last long enough. Surely we will miss exploring the island together with Ketut!If you are looking for a "good", "decent" or "very good" tourguide on Bali, go look somewhere else. But if you are looking for noone but the best there is on this island, you should go to be balinese tours and ask for Mr Ketut Ajus!Thanks again Ketut!

Great tour around the island. We called the day before our tour and the response was immediate. Our guide and driver was Ketut Ajus and he was amazing! Very safe driver and very knowledgeable of the island, the history and the places we've been to. We'd definitely take another tour with them!

Highlight of our Trip to Bali!. I contacted Julie after reading all the positive reviews on here. I knew the things I wanted to see (and didn't want to see) so I emailed Julie with my list. He replied promptly with lots of useful suggestions, very detailed, and easy to understand. We managed to create a full day tour which included most of the sights on my list. I also arranged airport pick up with Julie (which was much cheaper than what the hotel was asking for). My flight was delayed but I managed to stay in touch with Julie over whatsapp which was very helpful and gave me some piece of mind. When we finally arrived at the airport at 1am, Julie was waiting for us and made us feel very welcome! We had a lovely chat on the way to the hotel which made me really look forward to the trip we had planned a couple of days later. On the day of the trip Julie arrived on time with a big smile on his face. He provided us with lots of information about the sights we were looking at and we also had some great chats about Balinese culture and Hinduism. We learned so much! Julie also took some great pictures of me and my fiancé! We thoroughly enjoyed our trip and Julie's company! Julie went above and beyond to keep us happy and we couldn't have asked for a better driver/guide! We hope that we will have the pleasure of meeting him again in the future! Highly recommended!!!

YOU HAVE TO GO WITH THIS TOUR. One of the best tours I've ever been with. As with other reviewers, I was extremely impressed with Wayan Surya who was really dedicated as a tour guide. We picked the tour that brought us to some of the famous temples in Ubud as well as rice terrace and it was fantastic. He also brought us to one of the best kept secrets for lunch where we had such a nice view over the rice padi with really good food - all for a very reasonable pricing. Throughout the tour, he also played a very active role in sharing with us more about the culture and interacting with us. As an experienced tour guide, he also taught us how to ensure our tour was better by not falling into some of the common tourist traps. What I really admired about him was that whilst he looked after the welfare of us by giving us tips on how to avoid tourist traps or how to bargain, he never once intervened and helped us do it. It really shows how he balances well between being a dedicated tour guide and being a loyal local who understood his fellow Balinese friends. During the rice terrace tour, one of my friend accidentally got caught in a sticky situation with the mud and he took the initiative to get resources and help without any delay. We also liked that though we stayed in seminyak which could be quite far from Besakih temple (especially with a traffic jam), he never once complained about the distance and timing that took during travelling. Personally, we heard that the company is a family-owned company. A really small company but we loved it as such because the quality is so good and they treat their clients like their own family members. Really thankful for his company and the wonderful service by this tour. Will definitely recommend it to everyone!

Wonderful tour!. My husband and I just finished up our tour with Nyoman and it was wonderful. He let us tailor it to fit our needs and even took us to one of his favorite local restaurants. He was professional, friendly, and extremely knowledgeable on all things Bali. Great day!

Highly recommended! . We enjoyed a daytour to Ubud with our fantastic driver Wayan Surya, who took us exactely to the places we wanted to see and explained so much interesting things about Bali, the culture, religion, plants and everything we wanted to know. We had so much fun while driving also! Would book the tour straight away again! :-) thank you so much for that day!

Wayan juli made my vacation!. I cannot say enough wonderful things about wayan juli and the 3 days my husband and i spent with be balinese tours. From my first email with wayan juli, he was always quick in responding to my emails, and answering all of my many questions that i had. Not only is he professional, a wonderful driver, he is also a very caring, And compassionate person. I would have never discovered all the great things about balinese culture had it not been for juli. He shared personal stories with us about his life, his village, etc... he went above and beyond to accomadate my huaband and i. He even went out of his way to buy a comforter that i had seen, and left it at a mutual pick up spot where i retrieved it once back on bali! What other tour guide would do that? My husband and i will be back to bali, and look forward to seeing wayan juli again! Would recommend him to anyone!

Highly recommended!. Wayan Juli is a great tour guide! Please do not hesitate to book with him if you want a safe and reliable driver/guide to show you around the best places in Bali. He is not only professional but also funny, caring, courteous and very flexible with the itinerary. And his English is very good as well. He is very knowledgeable and tried to educate us about the beautiful Balinese culture. From the very first time I sent him an email, he was always ready to answer my questions and he was always very prompt in responding to my inquiries. Me and my family ended up booking 3 tours with him plus the airport transfer. We always felt very safe with his driving and I would definitely book with him again if I am back in Bali. To Wayan Juli, thank you so much for giving us so many wonderful memories in Bali. Until we meet again!
Friendly service. Juliana is knowledgeable, personable and great company. I recommend be Balinese tours for anywhere you want to go.

Top tour guide, excellent driver, and great service. Highly recommended!. Wayan Juli was a superb host in Bali, driving us wherever we wanted; water falls, rice terraces, beaches, mountains, dance performances, temples, shopping malls, street markets, restaurants, and back to the airport after 5 days. He is very reliable and punctual, as well as being flexible with last minute changes of plans, and was happy to wait patiently for hours while we shopped! Wayan provided a first class service. We would definitely book another tour with Wayan, next time in Bali.

Great tour guide!. Just came back from a week in Bali. We used Wayan Juli for airport pick up/drop off, and 4 days of touring. We went with Juli's proposed itineraries and had wonderful tours of North, East, and South Bali. He also took us around for a half day tour around Ubud after taking part of his family's cooking class, which was fantastic. More info on the cooking class can be found at https://www.tripadvisor.com/Attraction_Review-g297701-d7790864-Reviews-Be_Bali_Day_Cooking_Class-Ubud_Bali.html.Juli has excellent English, and is easy to talk to. He has a lot of knowledge of Balinese culture and will happily answer all of your questions. I felt very comfortable with him as our driver, and appreciated how flexible he was in accommodating our needs. I didn't have to worry about anything with Juli as our driver!

Hands down the best, most courteous, well-spoken, honest, reliable & flexible tour guide!. We’ve visited the area on multiple occasions and used many different tour operators and can say without a doubt, his service tops all of them on all fronts! His professionalism, caring, personalized customer service and responsiveness is his unique value addThis is a young man who after finishing a degree in tourism, started his own tour business, saved up to buy his own car, reinvested his profits to pay a for a web page, learned the in’s and out’s of registering his business with Trip Advisor, all while managing his business from his mobile phone. We originally hired Wayan Juli for an intense full day of tours around the area, visiting temples but soon realized it would be more productive for us to split the day into 2 half days. Juli was happy to accommodate and even suggested alterative options, combining areas with sites we hadn’t even thought about. Besides his refreshingly pleasant demeanor, we found him to be thoughtful and courteous in considering our needs along with the added benefit of being a skilled safe driver. He is knowledgeable and happily shares his love for the Balinese culture and the history of the area. On our first day out for temple tours, we commented on the beautiful rice fields we were passing. We were pleasantly surprised when he offered to pull over at a colleagues rice field and talked about the business of rice farming in Indonesia. He showed us the difference between new vs mature rice, the process of growing wet rice, and current challenges/ trends impacting their country. Although this was a diversion from our agenda, we never felt rushed into hitting our prescribed schedule. Besides his formal tour guide services, we found his airport transport to be cost efficient and reliable. He’s helped us arrange SIM cards for our mobile phones and we’ve used him as a driver for easier shopping and communicating with locals around the street markets. On our last shopping trip it poured rain. He provided an extra umbrella, called shop-owners to find out when they would re-open and dropped us off at a cute café where we could wait out the rain. When we ran out of money (not once but Twice!) he drove us to an ATM, waited and then drove us back to the street market. No matter what service he provides, we have found his prices more then fair and his customer service outstanding. In short, we love being able to work with one trusted guide, who speaks excellent English, quickly responds to emails and who we can count on to be completely honest and arrange all our varied needs.

Perfect two days in Bali. We arrived by cruiseship in Bali and we travelled with Wayan Juli for two whole days and saw many places in Bali. When we were mailing about the tours, he replied every mail very quick. If we visit Bali another time we will certainly e-mail Wayan again. We discussed about the places we wanted to visit and Wayan drove us safely to all the places we wanted to see.

Great Time i a Beautiful Place1. Wayan did a great job getting us to and from the airport, but more importantly he spent 3 full days showing us around beautiful Bali. We had made destination plans with Be Balinese before going to Bali, but Wayan was willing to change things up as we desired. We learned a lot about the people on this visit and saw some beautiful places which is what we were looking for. I would highly recommend Wayan Surya at Be Balinese tours.

Excellent Driver/Guide. We were on the Azamara Quest cruise ship and chose to stay a few days in Bali at the end of the cruise. We arranged 2 days of touring of our own itinerary with Wayan Juli. We were pleased with the service. Wayan Juli is a very good driver and excellent guide. He shared with us many details about Bali, including the culture and customs. His English is excellent and he is so enthusiastic and willing to share about his life in Bali. We highly recommend him.

Friendly and professional guide. We booked a tour with Be Balinese when we were visiting Bali last November. In all the correspondence prior to our tour, Wayan Julie was very responsive. At the last minute we realised that we had accidentally booked our tour on the wrong day (our fault entirely as we got our arrival date mixed up). Wayan Julie was very accommodating and we managed to change our tour at the last minute with Wayan Surya, one of Wayan Julie's colleagues, taking over our tour.On the day, Wayan Surya turned up promptly. He was friendly and professional. His English was good and we felt safe on the roads while he was driving. He brought us to various places on our requested itinerary and we found him very informative with a good sense of humour. You really felt like you were going on a day out with a friend.We had a great time and would happily contact Be Balinese again when we are next in Bali.

Amazing 2 day customized tour with Wayan. We planned out an intense 2 day tour with Be Balinese Tours and all our expectations were met and exceeded. Wayan was very flexible and accommodating. Also very punctual, easy going and professional. We learned a lot from him about the Balinese culture and all the different places we visited.

Awesome 2 days tour with Wayan. Celebrity Millenium cruise, Jan 3-17, 2016 - Bali, IndonesiaMy husband and I joined up with another couple we met through Cruise Critic for this 2 days Bali tour with bebalinesetour.I was totally impressed with our driver Wayan Julie. He was punctual, patient, courteous and fluent with English language . He showed up everyday earlier than our pre-arranged meeting time and took us back to the cruise in the evening after an exhausting day of sightseeing. The tour was very flexible, our requests were always satisfied. I enjoyed the fact that we always have options. My favorite place from this tour was Tanah Lot. The view was simply magnificent! It was a must seen destination! We also experienced some awesome local Balinese food, one particular restaurant served only “organic” foods, it was really delicious. The best thing of all, we squeezed in a Balinese massage on day 2, heaven!Thank you Wayan.

2 full day tours of Bali. My husband and I, along with another couple we met on the Celebrity Millennium cruise ship booked 2 full day tours with Wayan in Jan 2016. All of us were amazed with his professionalism and quality of service. From the start, when I emailed him about my request for his tour, he always responded me instantly, unlike other tour guides I worked with, for other ports. Based on the recommended sightseeing stops from his website, I selected the ones that accommodated my interest and worked with him to create a private itinerary for my group. He was efficient and his English is good.From the time he picked us up at Benoa port to start the tour till he dropped us to return to the ship in the evening, we spent almost 12 hours together on the first day, He gave us time to enjoy the sites at our leisure and privacy but also knew to give us history and cultural information when needed. He showed his care for us by constantly reminding us to bargain when we shopped and took us to the currency exchange kiosk in the city (versus the one at the port) so we would get a better exchange rate.On the second day, one of the stops was the monkey forest in Ubud. My girl friend and I changed our mind at the last minute and decided to opt for massages (highly recommended!) while our husband visited the monkey forest. He was eager to comply.We all felt very safe with his driving throughout the 2 days!If I return to Bali, I will contact Wayan for his service again with no hesitation!

Enjoyable and Accomodating. Wayan was extremely flexible with us as we requested a number of changes to his normal routines---later start times, limited walking and as few stairs as possible. Bali was extremely hot and humid and this was complicated by some mobility issues but Wayan did his best to make sure we saw most of the key highlights on our areas of interest list. Would recommend him ---his SUV was comfortable, he provided umbrellas and saris for temple visits. Thought he could have better planned the itinerary to minimize transit but recognizing the large group tours and their timing he did a good job. Suggest he provide cold water and cool towlets given extreme heat.

Great family business. We did a 3 day tour with Wayan all around Bali and I would recommend it to anyone. They are reliable, very nice to be with, knowledgeable and try very hard to please their customers. They helped me make the itinerary and added/dropped some locations and we had a great time. They answered my emails right away and are very professional. Book with them with no hesitation!

Hard working, trustworthy, dependable guy.. We had Juli for two whole days. We got to know him from his gentle and courteous manner. With his traditional costume we learn from him their religion dedication and the richness of Balinese culture.We went through many villages and temples, he was always patiently explaining the details of his proud land. .We are truly happy with his service and would recommend to our friends without hesitation.Thank you Juli for the great time we had!

Great guides. I initially contacted Be Balinese for a day tour based on all the good reviews here. But we ended up booking 4 rides with them even before we reached Bali. I contacted a few other companies reviewed on trip advisor and felt Be Balinese charged reasonably as compared to others. You however may find cheaper rides and negotiate better with local Cab drivers.The owner Wayan Juli was very responsive over email. He would promptly answer any questions I had during the booking process. He was also ready to accommodate couple extra spots that we wanted to cover. Our driver/guide for all the rides was Wayan Surya, who is a very polite gentleman. He drove us safely through the narrow and windy roads in the island. He explained well the history of the places we visited and the hindu culture and traditions followed in Bali. He was also interested in learning the traditions followed in India. We had a great time chatting with him!Below were our rides with them:- Airport -> Ubud- Day tour - We covered Tegallalang rice terrace, Ulun Danau Bratan, Sekumpul Water falls, Kintamani, Tirtha Empul, Gunung Kawi- Ubud -> Pemuteran(to visit Menjangan island) -> Ubud- Ubud -> Padang Bai

PERFECT DAYS IN BALI WITH BE BALINESE. We booked 3 full days with Be Balinese and it was wonderful. We plan in advance our trip and the contact was made via email. They responded quickly and make suggestions for us as well. The price was really reasonable for all day tripEverything was well organized and our guide picked us at the hotel as promised. Our days were customized to fit all of the sightseeing that we personally choose. Our guide/Driver Ketut Widana (Wi) consider our needs an adjust accordingly, he added some ‘’secret’’ location which has been worth to see. Really recommended company.Thanks a lot, we had a great time with Wi

Don't hesitate. Just do it.. I have nothing but absolutely positive things to say about this experience.From the onset, Wayan was super accommodating in allowing us to craft the day trip that we wanted based on our interests. We ended up going on a really fun adventure that was the perfect mix of culture/traditions, shopping and outdoor exploration.Wayan was super knowledgeable and educated us constantly throughout the day, always with a smile on his face. Because he knew the area so well, we were able to accomplish so much in one day (more than we could ever do alone).I would highly recommend you start your trip with this tour as you will have a deeper appreciation for Bali as a result.

Wonderful Tour Guide. We booked a full day tour with Wayan Juli while in the UK. The communication was excellent, and with his help we formulated a bespoke tour compiling a list of places to visit. Once in Bali, our guide Wayan Surya arrived promptly on time. He was extremely friendly and approachable. He took us to all the sites we wanted, and his narration was interesting as he shared his personal experiences about many sites. Throughout our tour we felt at ease and enjoyed our experience. I certainly highly recommend this tour and our guide, and in fact when back at the hotel passed on the details to other guests.After dropping us at our hotel, I discovered I forgot my camera in the car. I was impressed by the care shown by Mr Juli & Mr Surya, who came back to my hotel two hours later in the night to return the camera. I'm very grateful for this, which demonstrates the excellent care to customers.

Perfect Tour!. We toured with Be Balinese for three full days while in Ubud, and it was wonderful. Our days were customized to fit all of the activities and sights that we personally choose. All of our initial planning and contact was made via email. They responded quickly and were kind enough to make suggestions for us as well. Our guide was a local, so he was well informed. We visited all each of the locations we had planned and even added a few other locations that were not planned but on the way and a quick stop. We were very grateful that our guide was able and willing to do that for us. He wend above and beyond. We felt very comfortable asking a million questions and being with someone who knew what he was doing. Great company, very professional. Highly recommended.

Excellent Tour guide( good photographer too). we had an excellent time in Bali thanks to Wyan for the wonderful tour. we engaged him for two days in Oct 2015 . the big plus is he is an very good photographers too which is very good for those on honeymoon as you need not depend on any passer by to take your photos.

Great tour guides . My husband and I took a tour with Be Balinese this October whilst staying in Ubud. We had a late flight out of Bali and whole day to use we didn't want to spend waiting at the airport. Organizing a tour was a great way to go, and our guide even managed to take us to the airport at the end, without the need for a separate transfer from Ubud.We had a wonderful guide and driver - Ketut Ajus - who was happy to take our (multiple) requests in hand with how we wanted to spend out last day. The highlight was a local Balinese market as the sun was setting - a real glimpse into life in Bali away from the tourism-driven glitz and buzz. The local people were friendly and welcoming, and the market was full of life - with few, if any, other tourists in sight. The trip to the kopi Luwak / coffee plantation was also a surprisingly good adventure, and despite the fact that the coffee was clearly marketed towards tourists, the grounds and staff were lovely and Ketut took the time to take us through various spice and fruit trees that grow there. The tour is great value for money and wonderful that it can be individualized, and tailored to your wishes and travel plans. We had a wonderful time asking questions about everything, and having a few laughs. Would definitely use this service again!

An excellent tour guide. My wife and I had Wayan Juli as our tour guide and would recommend him when you were in Bali. We went to Tanah Lot, Ubud and Bedugul area, etc. We had lots of conversation during the drive about Balinese lifestyle and culture which is very enriching to our knowledge. Will not hesitate to call upon him for my next trip in Bali.

Excellent tour of ubud. Our driver for our day trip to Ubud was Ketut and you couldn't ask for a better guide in Bali! He was early to pick us up from our hotel in Nusa Dua and was incredibly friendly. He had a rough itinerary of what we wanted to see but was open to changing plans depending on what we felt like doing as the day went on. Ketut gave us a guided tour of a temple on the way to Ubud which was fantastic. He also took us to a beautiful waterfall and a relaxing coffee plantation. His best suggestion was our restaurant for lunch which was overlooking the rice terraces and had fantastic food. We decided to change our plans throughout the day and Ketut was more than happy to go wherever we wanted. He has amazing local knowledge of the area and wants to share the best parts of Bali with his guests. The best part is that he loves photography so will take excellent photos for you! Thanks so much Ketut for an amazing day in Ubud, we highly recommend him and BeBalinese and would definitely use them again.

Amazing authentic Balinese experience.. I was visiting Bali, Indonesia for the first time and was staying in the cultural heart of the island in Ubud.Having read tips on Trip advisor the best way to see the island was by private tour. Be balinese private tours had some excellent reviews so I decided to book through them.All correspondence is done through e-mail with Wayan. Final confirmation is given 2 to 3 days prior to start of your tour.There are several different packages you can choose from on their website, these as I found out can be very flexibly to suit your needs.Wayan turned up on time at my hotel ready for my tour. I had booked two different tours over two days. The price of the tour is regardless of how many are in the tour party. I was travelling alone which was not a problem.My tour took me to several temples and historical sights. Wayan was very knowledgeable in the history surrounding the temples and explained this in great detail. Be prepared to take some money with you as the tour does not include entrance tickets to the temples, lunch, water etc.The two days that I spent with Wayan were amazing, through his guidance I was able to imerse myself into the balinese culture. He was very acomodating, there was no rush things were done at your pace.I would highly recommended using Be balinese tours if you wish to see the true side of Bali.

Perfect place with perfect tour guide at an affordable price. We were looking forward for this trip, i emailed the company and they were very fast in answering my inquiries and very generous in granting all of my requests, i am a type of person who is very particular in all my needs because i wanted my travel to be a perfect one, i cannot believe that they only charged me $60 for a wonderful tour per day, while some would charge you on a per person basis, it is really worth, we were accompanied by Wayan Surya, he is a very knowledgeable, kind, cheerful,thoughtful, he speaks fluent english and he is a very humorous tour guide, we Loved this tour and all the places that Wayan Surya took us, all the places are amazing and exceptional, actually he is not only a great tour guide but also a great photographer during our stay, he took our pictures during our tour, he is so kind and he took care of all our needs specially when we went to Pura Tirtha Empul or the Hindu Balinese water temple,where we have soak ourselves to be blessed in their spring water, he took care of all our needs and even took many pictures for us, this tour is really an awesome experience, a perfect place with a perfect tour guide at a very affordable price, i highly recommend Be Balinese private tours

A memorable introduction to Balinese lifeways. Persuaded by other TripAdvisor reviews and the company’s highly informative website, we thought a tour from Be Balinese might provide us Bali newbies with a good introduction to Balinese culture. They did not disappoint! After only 24 hours’ notice, our guide, Ketut Ajus, greeted us at our Ubud hotel right on time at 9 a.m. Our first stop was the Goa Gajah temple; but before we got there, Ketut set the cultural stage for us—the basics of Balinese Hinduism, the role of temples therein, and the all-important do’s and don’ts of a temple visit. When we arrived, he supplied us with proper attire (sarongs, which we otherwise would have been obliged to “rent” or buy on the spot), and he then provided careful explanations of what we were seeing as he led us through the temple complex. This was the pattern for the entire day’s outing—which included more temples (each highly unique), and also walks through rice terraces, a coffee plantation, and a lunch stop overlooking Lake Batur. When we returned around 5 p.m., we felt that we had seen and learned more in one Balinese day than in a week in other parts of the world. Here in San Francisco, we often provide “tours” to visitors who want not only to see the sights, but who seek to live life and see the world as we do, if only for a moment or two. Ketut Ajus and Be Balinese presented Bali to us in a similar way, and we’re eager to come back for more!

Amazing Day with great guide . We found be Balinese tour on TripAdvisor, I send them an email for some information because we wanted to see some cultural and authentic sides op bali. Whitin one hour they replied and gave us some suggestions whitch places what we could visite. We booked a full Day trip from Seminyak to Ubud.Our driver Ketut Ajus was very friendly and spoke excellent English. He brought us to places which was the real bali. The first stop we attend a barong and kris dance, after that we wanted to visite a primary school, such an amazing experience that we will never forget. The Kids were so happy to see us. We visited the monkeyforest and the Rice terraces, and the Temple of the holy water and We went to the biggest traditional market of bali, we were the only tourist at that place. He took us also to a warung where we have tried some typical Balinese food, Babi gulang it was a bit to Spicy for me :-) but the food was very good. Our driver Ketut Ajus made this amazing Day compleet. He was very kind and helpfull he took so many pictures of us and Explained many things. When you book this tour ask for the driver Ketut Ajus and Im sure you Will have a lovely Day.Thanks again Ketut Ajus for this memorable day.Kind regardsJisca and Demian

Lovely drivers . Did two day tours with this company. Quick responses through email from Wayan Juli to plan our tours. The website is good and the price at $55 usd was reasonable. Our first tour was with Wayan Surya and second with Wayan Beno. Both were very genuinely nice people and we enjoyed our time with both, we felt really at ease with both of them and asked lots of questions which they were able to answer. Their driving was very safe and we felt comfortable with them navigating the crazy bali roads.Thanks to the 3 Wayans and if ever in Bali again I will use this company!

Wealth of knowledge and fun too. Decided to book this company for two, day long, tours. Communication was very prompt and great suggestions for possible tours. Wayan Juli was an excellent guide and driver with a wealth of chatting about the Balinese culture, sights, history and experiences. Very good driving around the scooter and truck filled back roads. We had a really good experience with him. We saw some amazing temples and rice fields and a fantastic sunset.

A local gentleman. We were hesitant to visit Bali, but we had a fantastic day thanks to the local knowledge and kindness of our host Wayan. We were collected from Benoa harbour and had a personal tour of the Ubud area that was second to none. The sights were not congested tourist spots, but were truly memorable, but it was the way we treated with respect for the day that sticks with me. Do yourselves a favour and contact them for any tour/transport needs in Bali, you will nit be disappointed.

Considerate and sweet guide. I would like to thanks juli deeply. He is a very considerate tour guide and always think of tourist first. He is willing to adjust his working hour because of we would like to start the tour later and finish it at night. Atlso, he voluntaryly waited us to finish the dinner and drive us back to the hotel at very late. He does not calculate much but would like to present the warmest image of Balinese. I'm deeply appreciated his passion towards tourists. Highly recommended!

Special days in Bali with Wayan Surya. We were 4 people who spent beautiful time for our first visit in Bali. Visiting other countries means for us a lot of things: to see new places, different vegetation, new people, new monuments. But the most important thing for us is to feel the life, the new culture and the heart of that country.Meeting Wayan Surya made us feel all these things.Thank you very much Wayan !

We love this tour guide! The best way to travel around Ubud!. We started the private tour at 31/8 at Seminyak to ubud. We made our own custom trip. We visited 2 temples, rice trace, Balinese house, coffee plantation. Every place made us peaceful and had perfect views. The tour guide is young, energetic, good at English, professional absolutely at all place, kind and easygoing. After the tour, we exchanged facebook and asked more about where is good for snorkeling and good restaurant. You don't need to hesitate, just choose this private tour guide. I can confidently recommend this guide.

Ubud tours. Thanks a million Mr Wayan Juli, for making our Bali honeymoon in Ubud such an unforgettable experience!! :PWe are now back in London and still can't believe we are no longer in Bali :( Really really missing it....We are so glad to have chosen you as our tour guide for our 2 days stay in Ubud. You have been superbly efficiently in dealing with our tour queries and we were really impressed with how friendly and knowledgable you were when taking us around Ubud. You know how to organize the tours logically so that we could really embrace the Balinese cultures and traditions in such a short amount of time and you also know what's best to recommend to your customers.We will definitely recommend your service to our family and friends when they are coming to Bali.Everyone, BeBalinese is a must-pick tour when you come to Bali! Wayan is friendly, genuine, humble and he will make your stay in Bali a most memorable one. You can't go wrong with Wayan :POnce again, thank you for your wonderful service Wayan and we can't wait to come back to Bali one day. You will probably be married with kids by then eh? :DTake good care of yourself Wayan! :)Anne & Duc

Great service and 100% customization!. My excellent impression of Be Balinese tours started with their quick response time, and their attention to detail. I found them on TripAdvisor and emailed them at 8 PM, the evening before my intended tour date. I didn't know if they would be able to get back to me in time, but they did -- and in such a great way too! They asked me what I was interested in, and I rattled off a bunch of things that I had seen on TripAdvisor, and in catalogs and guide books; and before my spouse and I went to bed that night, we had settled on a full itinerary with Be Balinese for the next day, and a pickup time of 8:30 AM.The next morning, our guide Ketut Widana was there right on time. He was very friendly and his vehicle was comfortable. He brought us to our first two stops, the Barong and Kris dance in Batubulan village, and a batik workshop. After the batik workshop, which had been quite touristy -- it was one of these huge showrooms that just had a handful of "artisans" in the front "working" on the craft -- my spouse and I agreed that we would rather see something less touristy, and more of the real Bali. We told Ketut this, and he immediately reworked our itinerary -- he drove us through the Balinese countryside, brought us to a beach with no resorts and which was frequented by locals, showed us through a smaller but "alive" (i.e., actually used by locals) and no less spectacular temple with few tourists, took us to a delicious restaurant for lunch and to another batik showroom with really rare and special products, and gave us a different view of the Tegalalang rice terraces. Having been accustomed to cookie-cutter package tours, this level of customization in response to what we were interested in seeing and doing was a refreshing treat. Also, though we ended our tour earlier than we thought -- we were exhausted by 5:30 PM and asked to be taken back to our hotel in Ubud -- Ketut Widana had actually been willing to go for two more hours. Excellent value indeed!My one [semi]regret is that I hadn't done more thorough research on Bali beforehand. Maybe I would have actually wanted to see some touristy, post-card-y things, just to be able to say I'd been there. But still, it was a great experience.

A first class tour though Bali.
