As part of our honeymoon to Bali we decided to go see the sights around the ubud area,After a search on trip advisor we decided to go with be Balinese.I emailed them saying we wanted to go to ubud but wasn't sure where, with in a hour I had a reply and also they had planned a route for us which was amazing.The next day our driver wayan surya turned up bright and early to take us out.We had a great day with wayan not only did he take us to all the spots in comfort and safety he also sorted tables at restaurants, talked us through the places he took us and we even learnt as much from wayan between the destininations. All in all this was a fantastic day I could not recommend enough and the same goes to be Balinese. Also a big thank you to wayan surya, paul and Rach.

Great tours. My girlfriend an me had some attractions we wanted to visit. After writing to Be Balinese tours they suggested two full day tours which are available on their homepage. The booking was fast and smooth.Our driver for both tours was Ketut Widana. We really enjoyed our tours, Ketut is a great guide and explained us a lot about the attractions and live in Bali in general.

Lovely day. We found Be Balise Tours on tripadvisor. After reading the good comments we decided to book a daytour. They were very quick on responding by email or whatsup. We visited Tanah Lot, Jatiluwih, Ulun Danu, ... Wayan Julie, our driver and guide, was very friendly and guided us very well. He is a young enthousiatic person who knew what we wanted. During the ride from one point to another i also had a good talk about the way of livin' in Bali, but also in our country Belgium. After a long day, he brought us to our next stay Candidasa. I also looked on the website of his family who rent rooms: Be Bali Stay. Thumbs up for Julie !

Enjoyed the Bali experience... Our first visit to Bali was a memorable experience, thanks to Wayan Surya. Even though we were in Bali only for 4 days, we were able to see all the places we wanted to see.Surya was knowledgeable in all the local events, culture, food and landmarks. We also were snap some great pictures with Surya's help. He was also very flexible the itenerary and we were able to add/skip some destinations depending on the time.Definitely will visit Bali again in the near future and use Be Balinese.

Wayan is a very good host and tour guide. I found Wayan on Trip Advisor and we hired him for the day, we told him what we wanted to see and he tailored a tour for us. He is very obliging stopped when we wanted to take photographs, telling us about the local culture and history, a very nice young man.We toured up to Lake Batur through rice terraces, heading off the beaten track, stopping off at little villages on the way it was just wonderful, he is a very good driver, with nice transport air con etc.Highly recommend him, worth booking. Thanks Wayan, Sharon and Shaune Downs

Remarkable experience!!!. It was really remarkable experience mainly thanks to Nyoman. Me and my wife took all day tour, which we booked in advance. The excellent review we have read about this tours company is absolutely true. Nyoman is very polite and agreeable man. He really could fulfil all your wishes. We strongly recommend the services of "Be Balinese-private tours". Thanks Nyoman for your kind cooperation and good luck!!!Apostol and Daniela

Excellent 3 day tours. I contacted Be Balinese quite late before arriving in Bali but they were able to accommodate me with everything we requested. We had different tour guides for each of the days we were with Be Balinese but all three of them were great in their own individual way. All three of the guides were able to give us lots of information on Bali, and traditions and customs. This was something we really enjoyed, as we wanted to really understand the island we were visiting. For the first day, our tour guide was Wayan Suriya. Suriya was very chatty and very interested in finding out more about where we came from. On our tour to the woodcarving villages, Suriya took us to a second place as we were a bit disappointed with the first. He was very helpful, and wanted to ensure we were enjoying everything in our tour. For the second day, we were with Ketut Widana. Wi also explained a lot about Balinese culture and often joked around making us laugh. He was very pleasant and we had some good laughs with him over the day. Our last tour was with Wayan Juli. This tour was only a half day tour but we enjoyed it just as much as the others. Juli was again just as pleasant as our other 2 guides. He was interested in finding out about where we come from, and was able to give us even more information about Bali. With Juli we visited Kintamani and the Spring Water temple. At both sites he was with us giving us information.All three tours with Be Balinese were great. Juli was able to organise 3 great tours for us, including everything we wanted to see. All 3 guides seemed to know a lot about the history and traditions of Bali, and were very happy to answer any questions we had and give us as much information as possible on the sites we were visiting. If I am ever in Bali, I will definitely book with Be Balinese again. Thank you from Cyprus!

Great guide. I had uncle Wayan as my driver over 2 days. His English was good and he was very interested in making sure I saw everything on my list and more. I worked with the owner for a few months before to make my custom agenda. I gave a list and he quickly replied back with a suggest itinerary. The car was spotless with great air conditioning. Super important on those hot days! I'd see use then again

Excellent tour guide. We spent to days with Weedana a very friendly guy who works part-time as a guide/driver and part-time as a farmer which I thought was very interesting.He was super friendly and grateful for anything happening to him in life, which is very different from what we're used to.Enjoyed :)

Professional. Great pricing. Efficient. Amazing.. Let's just start it is worth every single rupiah spent. My tour guide WAYAN SURYA was amazing. Many props to the organization as a whole. I was having many flight issues getting into Bali and BeBalinese was very responsive and effective--given the circumstances I put them through. I would recommend everyone to this tour agency. We did the Kintamani Volcano Tour. Every single second was very informative and amazing. Lets just say I just took the tour couple of hours ago and here I am giving a review right after. You will not regret it! Thank you Wayan Juli for your flexibility and responsiveness and Wayan Surya for the amazing tour! I will definitely be back in Bali and contact you guys. BTW, Wayan means First Born....Learned that today.

Very good tour. We booked our Bedugul tour via email and despite the short notice (2 days before, late in the evening) everything went really good and smooth.Our driver (Widana) was great, very professional, kind and friendly! The price was also cheap compared with many other private tours.We can only recommend Be Balinese private tour!

Experienced, flexible, and humorous. We'd booked Be Balinese Tours for a day trip to Ubud from Seminyak. Juli was warm, humorous, and knowledgeable - we learnt a lot about Bali's culture and history in a day. He also spoke very good English. He was very patient in helping us to decide which attractions to visit, and made sure we had ample time to cover the attractions we wanted to given the short stay we had there. Juli is very professional and experienced, and we are very thankful to have experienced Ubud in a day with him. We enjoyed ourselves thoroughly and would definitely recommend Be Balinese Tours.

Great service!. Be Balinese were very professional, accommodating and knowledgable. Our guide Wayan Juli, spoke excellent English, and adapted the tour to suit our requirements. He knew the best spots, away from the crowds, and a huge amount about Balinese history and culture. We would highly recommend Be Balinese. Thanks!

Great experience. While planning our trip to Bali we approached multiple tour agencies and chose Be Balinese Tours as Wayan Juli was very quick and informative in his replies. We quickly planned two full days of a private tour and ended up booking a third day since we loved the tours so much.During our stay in bali we learned how important it is to have a good guide!! Our guide Surya was very friendly , knowledgeable and with a great sense of humour! We felt at home with BeBalinese and we would trully recommend it to everyone! They are extremelly professional, flexible and took every wish we had in consideration!Thank you guys, you made our stay in Bali unforgettable!!! Fabian and Kameliya

Amazing Trip to Bali. When planning our trip I sent a few feeler emails to different tour groups and weren't impressed with their returns or prices. Wayan Juli got back with us immediately and was extremely patient in helping us plan our events. We ended up spending two days with him. The first day we did an all day tour. Throughout he was extremely knowledgeable and gracious. Stopping when we wanted/needed to and always being patient. He was great with our kids too and our 3 year old really liked hanging out with "Mr Wayan". On the second day we did the cooking class and it was awesome. We wanted our kids to see and experience Balinese life and this tour did a great job of that. We were able to go to his family compound and see how they lived and their farmland. We then got to spend a few hours watching our kids learn to prepare traditional meals with Wayan and his awesome family. Our sons even got to fish and eat their catch!Both days were amazing and our whole family loved it. If we ever go back to Bali we'll try to use Wayan for all of our trips.-Chris

Excellent time!. I just wanna to say thank you guys for the days the we spend together. Its was a great time for me, and now i can tell for everybody that i met Indonesia, and a lot things about the culture, touristics points,temples, curiosities.I was travelling in Asia for months, and Nyoman is the best guide and drive of all my trip.Also, hes a good photographer!Its a pleusure to be your costumer.If I go back to Indonesia, certainly hire again.Thank you!

Excellent time in Bali with BeBalinese!!. From the initial email that I sent Juli, he was super easy to deal with and very responsive. We provided him with a list of sights that we wanted to see and he was great at sorting/organizing it all for us. He was always open to whatever we wanted to do/see. We ended up booking with Juli for 5 days plus an airport transfer. Prices for full day tours are very reasonable. I am really glad that we decided to book with BeBalinese. Juli is very professional, knowledgeable, humble, accommodating, and punctual. Also, his English is great. There was never a dull moment during our time with him - the conversation was great. We learnt a lot about Balinese life, culture and history - we couldn't have asked for anything more. The best part of all was that it never felt like we were being shown around by our driver - it was more like spending 5 days with an old friend who was always willing to do anything last minute! We had a great time in Bali and Juli made it that much more memorable! If you're heading to Bali, we highly recommend booking with BeBalinese :-)

Excellent tours and experience. Highly recommend!!!. We arranged for five touring days and airport transfers. It was very easy to set up itineraries with Be Balinese and they are quick to respond to emails. Suggested itineraries were provided to us based upon what we wanted to see. The car (Avanza) was comfortable, clean and very reasonable prices for the day. We were very lucky to have Wayan Surya as our driver for all touring days and transfers. He is kind, humble, very knowledgeable, and always punctual. We felt very safe with him. He had great recommendations for places to eat and spoke English very well. He was always willing to answer our copious questions about the history and culture, and flexible when we wished to change the itinerary. I whole-heartedly recommend Wayan Surya as a driver and Be Balinese to anyone coming to Bali.

Excellent experience. From he first time I contacted Wayan Juli he was very responsive and he helped us plan the perfect few days to visit the main sights in Bali. We were picked up from the airport by Wayan Juli on time and he was a very safe driver as he drove us to our Hotel in Ubud, giving us some detailed information about Bali along the way. We also had 2 amazing days with another very professional driver Ketut Widana, who took us to see some great places in Bali. Ketut Widana was a very safe driver, spoke very good English, was very knowledgable about the area and recommended other places to stop and visit along the way. It was a pleasure to meet both Ketut Widana and Wayan Juli and we would definitely use them again should we be fortunate enough to return to Bali. Would highly recommend this company to anybody who would like to see more of Bali with a private driver. Thank you both for making our stay in Bali a wonderful experience.

Excellent service!. I contacted Mr Wayan because his website is very detailed. Since we were planning our trip at the last min, so were worried if we could not book any tour guides. Mr Wayan replied me very quickly and he introduced another guide who is his trustful ex-coworker Mr Nyoman. Mr Wayan arranged our requests and always replied promptly, so we did not feel any stress to confirm our reservation. Additionally, I believe the price for our tour was reasonable for their service, even compare to other companies. Anyway, our experience with Mr Nyoman was also excellent! He is fluent in English and Japanese. He has enough knowledge as a guide, and took care of us professionally. I appreciate Mr Wayan and Mr Nyoman, who made our trip very fruitful and impressive:)

Friend of Bali !!! Highly recommended !!!. This Tripadvisor account was created so I can write a good review for Wayan Juli :)From the time I started contacting him after reading great reviews from Tripadvisor, he has been very accomodating to all my requests. From changing of pick up time to adding more guests to the tour, Wayan offers me solutions rather than trying to conform me to a standard itinerary. He gave me the maximum flexibility to customise my tour but at the same time offered me his wealth of experience about Bali to better organise the tour for my family and in-laws.Our 1 day tour with Wayan Juli and his colleague, also Wayan, started off at noon with lunch at Bebek Tepi Sawah, followed by shopping at Ubud Market and enjoying the great view of the rice terrance at Tegalalang Village. Then we headed over to a plantation where we have our first experience of Luwak coffee. After which it was a night tour of Tirta Empul Temple and we ended the well organised tour with Naughty Nuri's signature pork ribs paired with local Bintang beer.Not only was Wayan well verse in his knowledge of his home town, he speaks really good English and is the safest driver on the road. In fact I think what I enjoyed the most were the long chats we had while on the road. We talked about everything under the sun from our hometown cultures to politics to food to personal topics like marriage and family.I think he is more than a guide of Bali. He is my first Balinese friend.Highly recommended friend of Bali!!!

Awesome and Memorable Experiance. My wife and I traveled to Bali in April 2015.The travel company which had done our booking for Bali booked a few tours for us beforehand with a travel agency from Bali called Pacto Ltd. Since Pura Ulun Danu Bratan and Pura Besakih were not included in those tours we searched for a tour guide on tripadviser and found Be Balinese tours whose owner Wayan Juli had very good reviews . We booked a trip to Pura Ulun Danu Bratan and Pura Besakih for 30th April 2015 with Be Balinese tours. It was good that we did not book this tour with Pacto Ltd since it made us realise the difference between the two. We had a horrible experience with Pacto Ltd and would not recommend them to anyone.Anyways our Be Balinese tour guide was Wayan Surya who picked us up at our hotel in Nusa Dua on time. He was an extremely good guide with excellent knowledge of all the places he took us to.Through him we came to know a great deal about Balinese culture, traditions and its people. He even knew a whole lot about India (my country)and its culture, which was quite impressive. He was friendly, very accommodating, willing to alter our route as we went (in one of our previous tours we missed seeing Mount Batur properly since it was all cloudy so when we told this to Wayan Surya he made a stop at kintamani so that we could spend some time there and get good pictures which we could not get previously), was very attentive, kept us engaged through the long drive with interesting conversations about Bali and India so that we did get bored and happily answered all our questions. He also has a good command over English. He made our Bali experience amazing and worth cherishing for life and we would definitely recommend Be Balinese tours and Wayan Surya to everyone who wants to visit Bali and make it memorable.Thank you Be Balinese tours for this wonderful tour.Ankur SharmaIndia

Getting to know Bali. We visited Bali in the beginning of April 2015 and stayed for more than 3 weeks. After having reviewed transport solutions for Bali on the internet we realised that there is much more to transport than simply going from one point to another. This is how we found Be Balinese Tour and Wayan who became our gracious host rather than a driver. Always quick to answer emails and flexible to adapt to suggestions for itinerary. Through him, we got to see Bali the way we had hoped for!From the North, in Lovina, to the East in Amed to the South in Sanur to the center in Ubud and many points in between, Wayan was a gracious host, a knowledgeable cultural guide and a really good driver too! My wife, who easily gets car sick, did not have any issues whatsoever! He was so nice to our children and understood the challenges it might bring to have small children along for all the tours. Always on time and with a welcoming smile! We can only recommend Wayan and Be Balinese with the warmest regards. Wayan, we really hope we were not too much of a burden and that you would consider having us again when we decide to visit in the future! Top marks! RegardsKatarina, Haroon, Maia and Emil

Awesome experience - Ubud tour. We booked a full day tour with Be Balinese - Wayan was our private guide for the tour. Wayan knew everything about the area and we covered lots of places in a single day..monkey forest, Ubud palace, Rice fields, tirta empul temple, kintmani and lake batur. Wayan even accommodated our request to be picked up from Seminyak in the morning and dropped off in Nusa Dua in the evening..although a long trip, but we fully enjoyed the tour..Wayan even took us through local shops where my wife picked up some balinese souvenirs..very fluent in english, interesting to talk to..and safe driver..will recommend the tour..very different from Seminyak/Kuta and Nusa Dusa areas..must do in Bali. Will definitely contact him again on our next visit!

Wonderful tour!. We had 2.5 days of customized tour w/ Wayan- he was a wonderful guide and driver, and was most accommodating for our family. Because of him, we were able to have a great tour of Bali, and learned a lot about the sites that we visited. Our email communications prior to the trip was always prompt, which was much appreciated. Thanks for a wonderful visit!

Excellent and prompt service. I like to pre-organise my tours before we go to a country and upon contacting Be Balinese, I was not disappointed. I emailed them with a long list of activities I wanted to do and places to see all over the island and gave them the task of fitting it into 2 days! They came back VERY promptly (within an hour) and confirmed dates, pricing etc. I had more emails back and forth confirming bits and pieces and it's like they don't sleep, they were that quick with their replies!For the tours, we got an excellent guide and driver, Nyoman Lovina; who was extremely knowledgeable of the deep cultural history and stories of Bali and Indonesia in general. We did the usual tourist spots which I won't list all out here. Nyoman was very flexible with the itinerary also though and ended up squeezing in a couple of Batik factories and coffee plantations on our 11th hour request. Very respectful, prompt and good value guide service. Would recommend for sure. Organisation of everything was smooth like butter.

A wonderful morning. We went on a half day morning tour of the Kintamani area including: Goa Gajah, Gunung Kawi, Tampak Siring, Temen village, Kintamani and Tegalalang. Wayan our guide was fantastic, his English was superb and we talked about a wide range of subjects from travelling to politics. The best thing was that Wayan got us started a little earlier than other tours (8.30am) so we were always a few minutes ahead of the crowds at each of the attractions and able to get wonderful pictures and look around the various temples in a stress-free way. In fact his timing was so superb that we even dodged a few ominous rain clouds along the way. I would highly recommend this tour and it's great value for money at a very reasonable cost.

The best way to experience Bali. We had the opportunity to work with Wayan during 2.5 days in our recent trip to Bali. Wayan always picked us up on time, he is friendly, welcoming, informative and accommodating. Throughout the 2.5 days he made his best to attend to our interests in order to learn as much about the culture and to take advantage of what Bali has to offer. His cars are spacious, comfortable and he is a great driver. I would not hesitate to recommend his service!!

Fun and informative whole and half day tours. Wayan Juli is a very good and safe driver but much more than that: he is a perfect tour guide. He is always eager to answer any questions and kept informing us all the time about interesting details when travelling in the car. His English is perfect and he is always on time and smiling. You can see he likes what he is doing. We have learnt a lot from him about local traditional lifestyle, how people pray and do offerings to Gods, go through cleansing, etc. in temples. Also we have learn a lot about Hindu Gods and Godesses which was very interesting for us. We have made all preparations for our tours via e-mail. He was always very fast to answer and gave well understandable information for us. Tours are highy flexible he will take you to any places in any order according to your preferences. Or he is also eager to suggest places to see. Highly recommended! Should we go to Bali again we will definitely book for tours and transfers again with Wayan Juli! Thank you again Juli!

Best driver in Bali. Wayan Juli is the best driver in Bali!He knows everything about Bali and was constantly informing us about all little things.My girlfriend has known him for 5 years now and keeps coming back to Wayan.He is a happy and safe driver who loves his job!

Fun half day tour. Wayan is a great and safe driver and replied promptly to my emails. We were pleasantly surprised to see him in the airport in his traditional clothings, and that gave a fun vibe to the trip. The places he suggested were fun, such as the volcano crater (forgot the name) which has an awesome scenery and the coffee plantation (we tasted good coffee there and bought some home as souvenirs too). In addition, Wayan is always attentive and happy to answer any questions that we have, and we learnt a lot from him especially on the Balinese culture. We wanted to arrange an airport transfer and even though he is booked on that day, he managed to contact his fellow team mate to pick us up, also Wayan, and he is great as well. Will definitely look for them again when we get back to Bali!

Excellent Tours. We had the pleasure of spending 3 full days touring (in addition to 2 transfers) with Wayan Juli. He was always on time - with a smile. Wayan was a careful driver - despite the horrendous traffic in Bali. We prearranged our touring itinerary with Wayan with many emails. Wayan was always very responsive to all of my questions. Wayan provided us with cold bottled water during our touring. He also had umbrellas in his van - for protection from rain and sun.After touring with Wayan, we feel that we have an excellent understanding of the culture and people of Bali. Thank you Wayan.

Great tour!. Of the handful of tours I've done, this one with Wayan was probably my favourite. He was a great guide and driver, very friendly and informative. He was very thoughtful, regularly checking in to see how I was and if I needed anything, and was quite accommodating as well, willing to alter our route as we went - when I realized I had already been to a couple of the prearranged tour, he offered alternatives. Additionally, planning communications and such were all quick and smooth, and he was prompt in picking me up. I would definitely contact Wayan again when I come back to Bali. Thanks again for a wonderful day :)

Safe, Reliable, Knowledgeable, and Fantastic - Wayan Surya @ Be Balinese. Spent part of the last month of 2014 in Bali Indonesia with my wife & in-laws and had the pleasure of having Wayan Surya as our 'personal tour guide' and driver around the island. Could not have made a better choice! First off, he was a very safe driver. The streets are a bit hectic there, very busy, and not all of the drivers we had took the safety of my family into account. Surya did and for that alone he gets our 100% Recommendation. Not only was he safe and patient, he knew where all of the places we wanted to go were, and he added to the experience by stopping by some places he thought we'd like. He showed us Bali temples, took us by the former house of the Royal Family, while explaining some Balinese traditions and really adding information to the sights & sounds of Indonesia. When we said we wanted to try Luwak Coffee, he took us to the place it was made, where we got a full tour and were able to try Luwak & other types of coffee! If the safety of your family is important, and want a driver that delivers more than just you to a destination, Wayan Surya at Be Balinese is exactly what you are looking for!

Be Balinese a wonderful experience. Just visit UBUD, Bali. Had a wonderful time. Thanks to Be Balinese. Petak was just wonderful. very warm and helpful. Will definitely contact Be Balinese during my next trip. Thanks so much for the wonderful time.

Wonderful trip to Bali. I had visited Bali in the month of December 2014. I had booked a cab for 5 days with Be Balinese Tour. Mr. Wayan Petak was the driver and guide. He was just wonderful. Very warm, friendly and informative. I will definitely recommend Be Balinese Tour and contact them during my next visit to bali. Thank you Be Balinese Tour, Team and Wayan Petak, me and my family will miss you a lot. Thanks so much. I will cherish this visit for a very long time.

Great time with Wayan Juli. We booked Juli for a few days during our say in Ubud. He was a terrific guide and I would highly recommend him to anyone! He was always responsive via email, very knowledgeable, a safe driver, and spoke great English. Additionally, Juli is very trustworthy and reliable. He was always on time picking us up and helped us avoid a few scams (i.e. being asked to pay double for a ticket to a local cock fight because we were tourists, etc.). We also signed up for his Be Balinese Cooking Class - I think this was one of our most favorite experiences while in Bali. Juli gave us a tour of his family farm and his aunts taught us how to cook some delicious dishes (i.e. chicken satay, soup, corn fritters, etc.). Thanks for a great time Juli!

Thanks A Million!!!:). I would like to thank Juli and Surya for being wonderful guides throughout the 10 days I was with them.They are careful drivers and always more than willing to offer me information about the various sites that I visited.Being a sole female traveller,they made me feel welcome, safe and taken care of.I will definitely recommend Bebalinese tour to others I know who are coming to Bali.I have made two new friends in Bali.So once again, a very big thank you from the bottom of my heart.:)Herda ( Singapore )31.12.2014

surya was awesome!. I booked a driver through bebalinesetour after having a bad experience with a random driver my hotel found for me the day before. I wrote to Juli and he responded right away! I told him some things I wanted to see and he helped make suggestions and create an itinerary with me. Surya was my driver and he was amazing! On time, speaks great English, very nice guy, and most importantly so knowledgeable on the history and culture of Bali. He was able to add and explain so much at each place we went. It was very helpful and I learned a lot! He was also able to drive me to the airport the next day. I recommended bebalinesetour to all my friends traveling to Bali and will forsure use them again if I ever return to Bali. Thank you so much Juli and Surya!

Surya #1 Recommended Driver. We spent 5 days in Indonesia. Surya spoke English and was very accommodating to all of our specific needs. Anything sights we wished to see, he was more than happy to take us too. We have made a friend in Surya while in Bali and hope to meet him again someday.

Definitely recommend. Juli is very responsive and stick to time, every appointment he will be there early and wait for your arrival, give some very good suggestion for our visit.Definitely recommend Juli to be your guide to visit Bali!

Best tour company in Bali. We spent three fabulous days sightseeing with Be Balinese and had an excellent experience. Our driver/guide Ketut Widana (Wi) did a fabulous job, he was a very safe driver, spoke excellent english and we learnt a lot about Balinese history and culture. Awesome job Wi, thank you.We booked our tour days over the internet before arriving in Bali and Wayan replied to all emails very promptly, in excellent english with detail. Our 10 year old daughter is very interested in history and culture and Wi went out of his way to make her holiday memorable. A trip into the crater at Mt Batur, walking on a quiet black sand beach and meeting Wi's family were her highlights of Bali and experiences she will never forget.Thank you Be Balinese for sharing your Bali with us and ensuring we had an extremely positive holiday, we look forward to spending more time with your company next visit.regards and hugs to LastMaeThe Ortel family

Excellent local guide. We had Wayan Surya as our driver for 2 days here in Bali. He is very friendly, pleasant, speaks good English and very humble.Coming from a small village in Ubud, Wayan Surya shared with us, amongst other things, his experience growing up in Ubud, getting married and also the Balinese culture/festivals. He is therefore not only a driver or a tour guide who brings you to touristy places, but nevertheless he is in fact a true local who you can learn a lot about the Balinese culture. We highly recommend Wayan Surya as your next local guide in Bali.

Super friendly tour guide!. Booked Juli for 2-day tour on oct 11-12. Juli speaks fluent English and is super friendly and nice. First day we went to elephant cave temple, spring water temple, Batur volcano, another temple by the lake (forgot the name) and then we went to a local market for shopping. Second day we went to Krisna first, which is a HUGE souvinir/clothes/snack shop near denpasar - this is a must go place for all tourist visiting Bali!! Juli waited for us outside for a good 2 hours! Then Juli took us to 2 beaches which were both nice. Finished the night off having seafood dinner bythe beach at jimbaran - Juli helped us to get 10% off discount!Overall, great tourguiding by Juli - hes very knowledgeable of the history of the temples, just a great person to chat with during the drive as well. Thanks Juli!

Excellent company. Our driver Wayan Surya was superb!. We hired Be Balinese Tour for 2 weeks in September 2014, and it was a superb choice to make. Our driver Wayan Surya, had many qualities that added tremendous value to our Balinese experience. His English was very good and easy to understand, and his driving skills were excellent (a big consideration when travelling in Bali!) Numerous times he exceeded expectations to show us the wonders of Bali, which he knew very well. Most important of all though, he was a really nice guy, always positive and great fun to be around. Thank you so much Wayan Surya and Be Balinese Tour!

Perfect day with Wayan Juli. Thanks very much to Wayan Juli who drove us all day long all around the island for the Bedugul- Tanah Lot tour.He gave us very interesting informations during our visits and knows well all aspects of the Balinese culture. But above all, he was extremely friendly and he is a safe driver and speaks a propre English. We liked this tour so much that we asked him to arrange us 2 other tours.++++ HIGLHY RECOMMENDED

"Triple Wow" for Wayan! . Wayan, we'd like to say thank you for a fantastic day with you which we'll bear in our mind and heart for a long time. You get a triple WOW from us because: -You gave an profound insight into your culture wholeheartedly and totally genuine - that's what we appreciated most. We got a feeling of the real cultural Bali apart from mass tourism streams-You provided Tour suggestions with very flexible possiblities to adapt the itinerary - You acted very professional and reliable at any time. Even in advance while booking the Tour via EmailWayan and also his Partner Nyoman are highly recommendable Tour guides!!!!

Amazing sevice, Great day out!. First i would begin by sayin Wayan Juli is by far the best tour guide we have had. First class communication and humble in every way. Had a great time visting the monkey forest and the temples. There were some thing we were not interested in and he was very accomidating. I would recomend him in a heart beat if you want to experiance bali to its fullest. He was great at explaining bali culture and the history and meaning behind all we saw. Me and Jess really enjoyed his company and spending time with him.

great driver and guide in Bali. We spent two days with Wayan Juli and we highly recommend his services. He is punctual, professional and very nice. He always tried to accomodate our requests and he was very helpful, for instance purchased for us the fast boat tickets to Lombok. He speaks fluent English and was very patient in answering to all my emails and queries.

1st best French guide of Bali. It is a joke, but Juli promised to speak French within 2 years... I am sure that he will respect his commitment!!!Otherwise, he is a very nice guy who took his time to explain the balinese culture & the history of each site we visited.He supported us during our stay in Bali, helping us when we had a problem of booking with our hotel in Gili Trawangan due to bad condition of the sea, rebooking fast boat...A very good relationship as a friend!Do not hesitate, he is the guy of the situation!!!Nadia & Vincent

Best Bali Guide. The other reviews say it all. Wayan Juli is one of the best guides in Bali. He was very flexible with the demands of my family and is quick to accommodate all their requests. We only had 2 full days with him, but we were able to see a lot. He's friendly, polite and very patient. Wayan Juli speaks English well and we had no problem communicating with him. I definitely recommend his services!

It's true - wonderful guide. 素敵なガイドさんです！. We booked Wayan Juli 2 days from/to Ubud and Pemeturan with stop-by like Teggallalan, Munduk, Tirta Emple etc. ８月中旬にウブド・プムトゥランで２日間お願いしました。一日目はタマンアユン・テガララン・ムンドゥックに寄り、一日置いて、キンタマーニ・ティルタウンプル・グヌンカウイを周ってホテルまで。以前の日本人の方のTAコメントを参考にお願いしたのですが、事前のメール対応もしっかりしていますし（返信が早い！、また額面は現地値段ですが保険も入っているそうです。）、もちろん幅広い知識の解説がとても面白かったです。なによりも、いつも笑顔で感じがとてもよく、人としても素敵な方です。Other TA comments are true, he has really wide knowledge and very good analysis of the culture and society. The same time he is very nice in person with lots of humor. 4 hours drive in straight-way between pemetruran to ubud, the first day he guided us to pemeturan, and went back to ubud, then with another customer during our stay at pemeturan, then next day pick us up at 10am and took us one day tour. He was really being nice always. Thanks to him, my husband likes bali after his first trip and our vacation became wonderful!以前日本語のクラスをとっていたそうですが、私たちのツアーの２日後にノヴァの日本語クラスに登録されたそうです（笑）。今回は英語のコミュニケーションで不安でしたが、彼の人柄のおかげで、英語が久しぶりでなかなか出てこない私も、苦手な主人もリラックスして楽しく過ごすことができました。こんどは日本語でお願いしたいと思っています！ジュリさん、がんばって（笑）！

Believe it. Believe what you read - Wayan Juli is a fantastic guide. I had booked two days withi his company. Wayan's communication was great before we arrived in Bali, and even better in person. His English is excellent, and he's a really sweet guy. He is punctual, he's professional, he's kind, laid back, and he's also extremely knowledgeable about Bali. I asked soooo many questions and he was patient and answered them all in a way that showed he was really passionate about his country. What more could you ask for? I would not hestitate to hire him again, and highly recommend him as a guide and driver.

Patient and Accommodating Guide. Wayan is always prompt in replying my multiple email queries. Amongst all the guides that I had approached, he was the only one who was flexible enough to plan my itinerary based on the places that I wanted to visit. He also helped make reservations at the restaurants that I wanted to try.He was supposed to be our guide for 2 days but fell sick at the end of the first day. He was responsible enough to arrange for Ketut to take over for the second day. Ketut is also another very patient and accommodating guide. Both are safe drivers. They made my holiday in Bali truly memorable.

Great experience with our driver and tours!. Great service, drivers and tours! We were extremely happy and satisfied with our driver Ketut who was always helpful and nice to us. It was a great introduction to Bali, its culture and hospitality. They were patient and took care of us at all times! They were very open and flexible and gave us great suggestion! Highly recommendable!

Wayan Juli - Great Guide!. My family and I had the privilege of hiring Juli as our guide during our Bali trip from 9-10 Jun 14. Prior to the trip, I had sent numerous emails to ask questions on itinerary, price, etc. Juli was very prompt and patient in answering and this efficiency is hardly matched by other tour operators. During the trip, he made us feel very comfortable and safe. He has very good driving skills, was patient with elderly, and also provided good information about Bali and helpful suggestions with lunch/dinner. Although some of our requested itinerary were not met (like viewing a cock fight and watching sunset at Uluwatu), we know Juli has tried his best to help us. We are very glad to have booked him as our guide/driver and will not hesitate to recommend him to our friends :)

Best driver in Bali!. I travelled in Bali for one month, always with drivers. Juli was without a doubt the best!Not only is he a very good driver, he's also a very passionate guide. He has so much knowledge about his country! And he keeps bombarding you with it until your head is full! Up to you to see how much you can handle!Even when he already had commitments, he made sure I got a driver at the requested time. He is so helpful and so humble. Such a sweet guy.Thank you so much Juli, you are the best!!

Perfect Day!! ---　素晴らしいツアーです！. We booked 2 day trips through email 10 days prior to arriving in Bali, after reading reviews on tripadvisor. This turned out to be one of the best decisions of our trip! Emails were answered promptly (always within 24 hours) and everything was fantastic.Wayan is a genuine gentleman, very informative and friendly and never tired of answering many questions. We learned a lot about local life. He even arranged us a tour on Galungan day; a special Balinese holiday. As my friend was interested in visiting to see a Balinese healer, Wayan also kindly offered us to take to the house of a famous palm reader he knows on his day off, although he was busy in preparing for Galungan ceremony. The whole 3-day tour was stress free and simply our best day in Bali.今回、日本語を話せる外国の友人との旅行で、日本語か英語を話すドライバーさんのどちらが良いか悩んでいました。tripadvisorや4travelなどのサイトを比較検討し、emailを送ったところ、一番対応が丁寧で早かった「Be Balinese Tour」さんにお願いすることにしました。決め手はクチコミの良さと、事前の対応の良さ。一日目は、ウブド発着で朝から、タマンアユン寺院、レイクブラタン、ジャティルイライステラス、タナロット寺院、ウルワツ寺院のケチャダンスまで、丸一日ガイドして頂きました。二日目は、ガルンガンというバリの大切な休日の日に、サムアンティガ寺院、グヌンカウィ寺院、ティルタエンプル寺院とキンタマーニ高原までの半日ツアーに連れて行ってもらいました。ティルタエンプルでは、友人が沐浴をしたいと事前に伝えたところ、サロンやお供えなど必要なものを全て揃えてくれる親切さ！また、予定では無かったのですが、友人がバリのヒーラーを探していると伝えたところ、ガルンガンの準備で忙しいのにも関わらず、彼の知り合いのヒーラーのお家まで連れて行ってくれました。今回は、行きたいところが決まっているので、細かく順路を書いて予約しましたが、もっとアバウトに「適当に観光して、どこかでご飯食べたい」くらいで、ワヤンさんにコースを組んでもらうのも面白いと思います。英語でコミュニケーションを取るのが苦に感じない方なら、ぜひお薦めです。ちなみに、ワヤンさんは日本語もほんの少し話せますし、これから勉強するそうです♪

This is the ONLY way to see and appreciate Bali - with the guidance and knowledge of a local guide. My partner and I were very fortunate in discovering 'Be Balinese' Private Tours.- because our second visit to beautiful Ubud was made so much better. This is a professional service - one where the benefits are obvious from day one! Well prepared vehicle (so carefully driven!) and a bright, smart, intelligent guide whose English was excellent - and sense of humour appreciated. Our thanks go to Juliez and Ketut for their contribution to a fantastic time in Bali. Long may you prosper!!

Excellence Service, The Best Private Guide in S.E.A. I really had a great time in Bali by not only the great places & attractions, also the great hospitality of my guide "Wayan". He is the best guide I ever had on Southeast Asia. Reliable, knowledgeable, great service mind, his genuine gentle and sincere smile that also made my trip most memorable. This is the real Bali hospitality. I am working in travel/hotel industrial, I would say that "Wayan" is one of a kind, he set the standard service at the unbreakable level. I would recommend him to our friends for future visit. Without you, this trip couldn't be that perfect!!! -- Thanks for The First Class Service!!

Real Bali!!. I have no words to describe how great was our guide Juli! We book a first tour with him for a cooking class that finally turned to be a lot more than that! We had one of the most beautiful day of our trip with him and his family cooking vegetarian food and learning so much about Balinese culture. His english was almost perfect and it was nice talking with him! After this day, we decided to book a second day to visit the Jatiluwih rice fields. Again, we did so much more than what we expected : we visited a traditionnal market, the beautiful Bratan temple on the lake and much more! I couldn't imagine a better way to visit the real Bali. Again, thanks for everything you shared with us Juli and we hope to see you again! -Sophie+JF

Be Balinese in Bali. Seen part of Bali and became immersed in the culture of this lovely island with Juli and Ketut from Be Balinese tours. Exceptional, careful and considerate drivers, highly appreciated in the Bali traffic! Also knowledgeable, fun and interesting guys with excellent English skills.

The most helpful, service-oriented guys! . These guys were the most helpful people, calling everyone to find someone to drive me at night to the airport. So friendly and helpful! Since the shuttlebuses stops going at 12:30 during low season, I was having real problems finding someone who would take me there without it costing me a fortune. These guys were great, and it ended with me paying not a lot for an ojec. Would recommend to everyone!

Great day out with Ketut. Have just got home after a great day out with our guide Ketut. We had a full day from 9-6.30 pm exploring a range of attractions around Ubud. The trip included a Balinese show, craft workshops, temples, coffee plantation and views of the rice terraces and volcano - a real mixture. Ketut spoke great English, was able to explain Balinese life and traditions and had a good sense of humour. Ketut knew great places to stop - and I did not feel pressured to purchase souvenirs along the way - he chose the stops because of the good quality demonstrations not a commission arrangement like in some other countries. We visited a water temple and Ketut took the time to explain the purification process, organise sarongs and offerings so that we could take part - a very special memory. Overall a very memorable day. Many thanks Ketut and Be Balinese.

Go with this tour!. Wayan Juli is a fantastic guide. We actually used two guides while we were in Bali (Wayan for two days and another for one day), and it was like night and day. (We also had checked around with a bunch of drivers before booking Wayan, and his prices were the best that we found.) Wayan speaks fluent English, organized two great days for us, explained everything very well, and was just fun to be around. We learned a lot about Bali culture, religion and history from him - and he was eager to answer our questions. Our time with him was just a pleasure and a highlight for our trip.

A charming and knowledgeable guide!. A friend and I spent half a day at Juli's home with him, touring his family compound and farm near Ubud, and harvesting and cooking an enormous and delicious Balinese lunch with him and his equally charming aunty and cousin (who are fabulous cooks). We had a wonderful time, and Juli was full of interesting information about Balinese life, culture, and food, and many great suggestions about things to do and places to visit. On our last day in Bali, we had hoped to book Juli for a tour of Uluwatu en route to the airport. He was unavailable but quickly arranged for an equally friendly and professional colleague to take us, and again, we had a great time. I highly recommended Juli's services to anyone interested in a guided tour of Balinese attractions.

A excellent guide with lots of informations to share and really professionnal!. We discover ubud and its area thanks to Wayan Juli. He is a really good guide. He proposes us an itinerary according to what we except to see. He answers to all our questions and explains lots of things! A really nice men . I really recommend him for your travel ! Thank you so much! If we have chance to come back we will meet you again!

Great tour!. Juli gives us a great trip! He is very friendly and helpful. He gave us a lot of suggestions about where should we go and what to do. Apart from introducing the attractions, he also told us about local Balinese culture. With his help, we really have a good time in Bali. We will definitely have him as our tour guide again next time!

Wayan Juli number 1. My wife had been conversing with Wayan for quite some time over the internet, every question answered ( very quick response ) booked a couple of tours with Wayan & was not dissapointed his knowledge of the area was second to none & his pride for Bali showed when he spoke of the traditions.His driving manner is so calming even in the Bali traffic & his English is very good we had a full day tour with him @ a rather cheap price we unfortunately had to cancel the second day due to illness.We paid in advance & told Wayan to keep the money as a gift but he told us he couldn't keep it because he hadn't earnt it. He has given us a free tour the next time we are over in Bali. Wayan is a true professional & a genuinly happy person

Very good service / Very friendly & professional staff. We were walking on the Jl. Dewi Sita street and found the small stand of "Be Balinese" just by luck. Since we were looking for an organized tour in Bali, we just went there and asked. The person (Wayan Juli, also guide) at the stand, was very patient, answered all our questions, took the time to show us and explain the different options that we have. It was a very nice experience from customer point of view. We booked the "Bird's walking tour", the trip to Gili Islands from Ubud with pick-up at the hotel, and the way back to Kuta, and 2 day tours in Bali. All in all, the prices are quite attractive and it's definitely an excellent value for money. The 2 day tours with Ketut were very nice. I can only recommend.

Friendly, safe and informative. Overall, I had a really good experience with Be Balinese. I made my booking through email and it was such a pleasant surprise to see that Wayan respond so quickly to my requests. When we arrived at Bali, i received an email from Wayan to remind me when we were meeting the next day. I was impressed. The next day, Ketut came in place of Wayan because he was not feeling well. Ketut was an amazing guide. His english was really good and we had a really good time just chit chatting about life in Bali and his childhood. I told Ketut in very general terms what I wanted to do (i.e. rice fields and sunset at Tanah Lot) and he organised our itinerary for me immediately. first, he brought us to the Royal Temple. There, Ketut launched into a lot of history behind the Balinese culture which we found really interesting. Next up we went to Jatiluwih which was gorgeous. I love that place. Lunch was arranged for us - I would not say that was my best meal but it was decent. after that, Ketut brought us to roam around the rice padi fields. there, i found true peace and serenity. Ketut knew we did not want to rush around going through one attraction after another so he gave us plenty of time to explore Jatiluwih on our own. for a few hours, my friend and I just sat down on the fields and chatted. Ketut busy himself with his other tasks behind us. He was not intrusive but remain near enough in case we needed help. Sunset at Tanah Lot was breathtaking - if you didn't plan to go, you should because the splash of colours in the skies will shock you. There, Ketut showed us around, explained to us how the various rituals work in Bali. Then he left us to enjoy the sunset on our own. it was a beautiful day. On our way back, Ketut gave lots of good recommendation for food. we thoroughly enjoyed ourselves. never felt unsafe throughout the trip. Ketut is also a very safe driver. I would definitely recommend Be Balinese Tours!

Highly Recommend. We ran into fellow Albertans on our trip and they had highly recommended Be Balinese tours for our time in Ubud. I'm glad they did! They were extremely fast to respond to my email request and Ketut (our guide) arrived 15 minutes early to pick us up for the day. He was a great guide, excited to show you around Ubud and provide some history and cultural background. We liked him so much, we arranged for him to come back and pick us up for our transfer to the Legian. They really go above and beyond to make your experience enjoyable and easy for you.

Just fabulous. We spent 1 Beautiful Day with katu - we recommend hardly this organisation - his love of his country was felt And we enjoyed the Time passed with him - he takes Time to explan And he is very clever / his english is very good/ don t hesitate/ thé prince is alto attractive / good luck

Affordable Yet Adjustable Tour Itinerary.... Wayan Juli is very nice and excellent guide for my last trip in Bali.. he is very informative and not calculative.. even I never confirm my trip with him yet, he always give me all information that I need to arrange for my trip with family, example : for our route for 3 days, restaurant, rafting and spa..He always give choices of places that can cater our activity plan, with some alternatives that allow us to find and experience the best...Its completely the right decision to confirm my trip with him, I will come to visit Bali again, and sure will be contacting him.

Friendly And Perfect guide. Wiyan Juli is an excellent guide and efficient driver.He helped me in preparing the itenerary to Bali .We covered most of the important places in Bali following his advice.As promised he always used to be there in the resort on time.He is so accommodative when we asked for changes in the itenerary.He did graduation in tourism because of which he has immense knowledge about Bali .He is very prompt in giving replies to our queries.He is a cheerful person and I would advise everyone to select BeBalinesetour with Wiyan Juli when you come to Bali and enjoy beautiful Bali.

Great first hand experience. Wayan Juli is an efficient and knowledgable young man who will do well in the tourist world of Bali. We booked him on line and was extremely prompt in his responses. We gave him a list of things that we would like to see and he did this efficiently, punctually and safely in the (interesting) Balinese traffic. We were also interested in an evening dance performance so he returned us to our hotel late in the afternoon and then returned at 7pm to take us out again. The quality of service was exceptional and the experience we had was fantastic.

Excellent guide!. We very much enjoyed our tour with Juli! He was very patient when we had to start our tour 2 hrs late (because of an issue I had to work out with our airline). He met us right at the hotel and took us wherever we asked in a well-maintained, clean car. When we were undecided what to do next, he had great suggestions. His English is excellent and was friendly and engaging to talk with. I absolutely would recommend his services!

Don't just see Bali -- be Balinese!. Even way before I arrived in Bali, I knew that I was in for a great experience from my correspondence via email with Wayan. He responded to all my emails swiftly (within 24 hours) and was very patient in answering all my queries and doubts about Bali. Wayan also tailored an itinerary that eventually panned out to be immensely enjoyable, with equal bits tourist spots for first time visitors and hidden surprises well off the beaten track. Wayan was preoccupied during my first two days in Bali so he left me in the hands of his uncle (Made Suweta) who was a good guide in his own right. But the magic really took off when Wayan took over on the third day. We started the day with a visit to a Balinese village way off the tourist radar, where Wayan gave numerous interesting titbits and insights about the local way of life. He explained in great detail how the education system worked, how locals prepared offerings, etc. with just enough humour to keep the boredom away, which was really enlightening. The journey to the other places we visited (such as Bedugul and Tanah Lot) was long but never arduous because Wayan would keep us engaged with anecdotes and trivia about Bali. Wayan is a great conversationalist and you'll never have a dull moment with him -- just ask him for his opinion/insights on matters ranging from Indonesian politics to favorite warungs! I was particularly interested in Indonesian/Balinese history and Wayan proved to be extremely knowledgeable about the subject too! Wayan also gave great tips for photography at the numerous spots we stopped at. His advice was spot-on and it was thanks to him that I got some of my best shots. At Tanah Lot, for example, Wayan led me away from where the main bulk of the tourists were to a more secluded area where I had great shots of the sun setting behind the temple. Similarly, at Jatiluwih, Wayan led me down the tracks to the rice fields where I obtained a more intimate and authentic view of the locals, as opposed to observing from afar. When it comes to recommendations, you similarly won't go wrong with Wayan. For our last dinner in Bali, Wayan recommended a Padang restaurant around Ubud that was both delectable and affordable -- it turned out to be one of the culinary highlights of the trip! He also recommended a kecak dance around town -- also an unforgettable experience I would've otherwise missed had it not been for his advice. Always there with a friendly smile, Wayan made me feel more than an observer of the local culture; he made me feel as though I were almost local, and he showed me what the true Bali is, stripped of the postcard cliches. Above all this, Wayan offers one of the most competitive rates there is out there -- especially for a service without a time limit. I couldn't recommend Wayan enough! When we parted ways at the airport, I regretted not extending my stay in Bali because such a short stay couldn't possibly do justice to this beautiful island, especially with such an extraordinary guide. I'm determined to return to Bali, and when I do, I won't hesitate to contact Wayan again for another trip!(P/S: If you're reading this, Wayan, I hope you enjoyed the Arts Festival in Denpasar!)

Five PLUS PLUS!!! Two days of magic!. AMAZING!!! Juli was our guide and driver for two magical days in Bali. He is an amazing young man, full of fascinating information and always smiling. We were so comfortable with him from the first minutes we met. We had a plan, but the heavy rain led us to change some things. On our first day, we went to his family compound for a fabulous lunch. We were in a lush jungle (no bugs!) with a beautiful open air kitchen and seating area. We met some of his family members, including his Auntie (a superb cook!), his cousin's wife and her kids. Juli's Auntie prepared a wonderful meal that will be a bit hard to explain. Everything was presented in banana leaf bowls and plates. Before eating anything, his Auntie prepared an offering to the spirits. This is something that is a huge part of their lives. It is the first thing done in the morning, after cooking and after eating, and the last thing at night. We had a pyramid of rice surrounded by corn fritters, a wonderful small dish of a tomato sauce, some spicy sauce with lemon grass, chicken satay and some kind of dumpling, steamed in a banana leaf pouch. We were made to feel like royalty as we tasted local cuisine, prepared and presented beautifully! We learned more about their customs and the offerings they make to the spirits and deities.This was one of the most fascinating parts of our two-day adventure with Juli. Learning about the local customs, schooling, families and religions gave us a sense of awe and appreciation for the Balinese people. That's what "Be Balinese" is all about - you can learn about and feel the gentle warmth and vitality of Balinese life.We talked about what would be of interest to us and Juli made suggestions for places to see. We visited beautiful temples and museums and the monkey forest (you must see it). We would start the day having breakfast together after he picked us up and then we would enjoy the scenery as we drove to our various destinations. Ubud, the artist town was great for shopping!Bali is very inexpensive and extraordinarily beautiful. Juli is the perfect guide for anyone wanting to see beautiful sites in a beautiful country. We only wish we could have stayed for a few weeks to really take it all in. We WILL go back and Juli will be the first call we make to ensure he is available!btw, our ship was three hours late in arriving, and Juli was waiting for us with a big smile and no complaints!Use him as your guide and let me know if you feel the same way!!! Having your own private guide and car at amazing rates was just like being royalty!

Very nice driver & very nice tour guide in Bali.. I had very nice impression in Bali with my first experience with my nice driver & nice tour guide.. (Wayan-Juliana). We went there 4 persons, including my mom. From the beginning, my mom didn't know about Bali. She reluctanted to join with I & my friends to Bali. After she went there already, she fall in love with Bali & nice Tour Guide like Wayan-Juliana, too. He recommended us all of the nice places in Ubud, Kuta, etc. My first time in Bali were quite worthful. Last time, we went to many places & also tasted many local foods according to my tour guide's recommendation. Next time, we planned to join his rafting trip also. If we have more free time, next time, we will go to see the Loma show there also. I recommended "Be Balinese Tour" to my friends & anybody who wants to visit Bali, too. Next time, I plan to go to Bali again with my family and will contact to Be Balinese Tour. Thank you very much to Be Balinese Tour to made us knew a lot about Bali. (^_^)

See Bali, any way you like!. My partner & I could not speak more highly of the Be Balinese tour guide, Juli! He was absolutely fantastic. We had already thought of where we wanted to go but he advised the best places to go at which times and provided a lot of interesting information about the culture, religion, various 'towns' and goings-on...The place recommended for lunch was superb with beautiful views and excellent food without the crowds and when we were dropped off at the end of the day, Juli recommended a restaurant which turned out to be our favourite meal in Bali! We had a wonderful day with Juli and encourage anyone who wants to see Bali with a very friendly guide, go see Juli, he will take good care of all your needs! :)

Fantastic guide for a fantastic holiday. Wayan Juliana (or Jul as we called him) is the best tour guide/driver we have ever had in Bali. His knowledge about balinese culture and history is outstanding. He explains everything very clearly and thoroughly. He is very proffesional with very warm and friendly approach. He goes above and beyond what would have been expected from a normal guide. He was always ready with solutions and advices everytime we called him with questions (as stupid as : where can my dad in law get a nice haircut in Ubud ?). Spending 10'days with him in bali has made our holiday so enjoyable and memorable. I highly recommend Wayan Juliana as your tour guide in Bali.

A fantastic Balinese tour and tour guide. I highly recommend Be Balinese to any traveler who wants to *really* see the island of Bali. Our guide, Julez, spoke perfect English, drove us all around the island, and taught us about its history and culture. Our Be Balinese tour made our trip quite memorable!

Friendly, Knowledgeable, Accomodating, Interesting and Personal. If you want a private and personal tour given by a very nice man, fluent in English, knowledgeable about all things Balinese, then this is the tour for you! Choose from a selection of Bali tours, be picked up by Juli, and let the adventure begin. Juli can accommodate with special requests such as dietary requirements ( in our case vegetarian and/or Sumatran cuisine!) and locales off the beaten path. Juli is very knowledgeable about the history and customs of Bali, all of which are very interesting. We liked Juli so much, we hired him as our personal driver the next day! It's a fun filled very private tour and is highly recommended!

We Love Wayan!. My husband and I were in Bali for our honeymoon. We are from NYC and are picky about getting good service. We found Wayan through Trip Advisor and he was wonderful. He drove us around for the day in Ubud. He told us all about Balinese culture, took us to a coffee plantation and even to his friend's traditional Balinese wedding in a compound! It was incredible. He also drove us down to Seminyak -- all for a great price. He was polite, happy and made us feel really comfortable. I recommended him to another couple from NYC and they loved him too. I would recommend him to anyone!

Great driver!. Juli was a gracious host that made our stay memorable! Very reliable and a great driver. He can make you feel welcome and has extensive knowledge about Bali. He even went above what was expected of him to make sure our needs were met.

Breathtaking experience . Made Holidays is highly recommended and that's no joke! We took a private trip to Sambangan waterfalls and got to see probably one of the most beautiful views we have ever seen. Not to mention sliding and jumping in the waterfalls! After that we also got to see the humongous rice terraces and beautiful Balinese views. Our guide Made, who was a very good driver and fun company, also took us to taste some local coffees and teas. We also booked a boat trip to Gili T for a reasonable price for the next day. All in all, I have barely anything bad to say about our day with Made Holidays and I can genuinely recommend the office for everyone.

Big thanks to our guide Made Mouse!. Great experience with our guide Made Mouse who picked us up from our hotel and drove us out to Mt Batur in time to trek up for the sunrise. I would highly recommend booking with this company, the prices were reasonable, the guides were friendly and knowledgeable and we had great experiences. After our sunrise trek we visited the Satria Coffee Plantation and later overlooked spectacular rice paddy terraces. Made Mouse was very entertaining and patiently answered all of our questions. We felt like we had a bit more of an understanding about Balinese culture after chatting with Made. When I return to Bali, I will definitely be booking all of my activities through this company. Thanks again Made Mouse!!!

Griya was amazing!. Griya made my Bali experience all the more enjoyable than it already was. From the moment he picked us up at the airport I felt I was in safe hands. A truly delightful human, with so much knowledge of his country, a wonderful sense of humour that had us laughing every car ride, and a passion for his work. Griya drove us to a few places around Ubud including taking us on a few temple tours where he also guided us through. I had the best time meeting this lovely man and having him be a part of my Bali trip!

Magical!. Grya is hands down the best local driver in all of Bali. I met him in July 2015 while living in Bali for 2 months and he took my friends and I all over the island, while based mostly around Ubud. His smile lights up a room, he has the best music, and his English is amazing and therefore makes it easy to cater to any trip you want and he knows all the best spots- both tourist and off the beaten path. I have been to Bali a few times since then and he always is the first person I call. His prices are very reasonable and I consider him a friend now, more than just your average driver. I send my sincerest gratitude to this beautiful human.

Highly recommendable!!. We just got back from our honeymoon in Bali. We were recommended Made Holdidays by a friend and were advised to ask for one of their drivers in particular called Manchok. Made was extremely helpful and responded quickly to our enquiries from the first day we contacted him and he set us up with Manchok. A very professional level of service.Manchok's vehicle was perfect for the job at hand, extremely clean, air conditioned and mechanically sound. He is a very safe driver who knows the sign post free roads of remote and rural Bali like the back of his hand. Always on time, really friendly, helpful and so considerate - a true professional. He made sure our trip to Bali was unforgettable and thanks to Manchok we got a great insight into Balinese life which is exactly what we wanted to get out of the trip. I would highly recommend Made Holidays and of course recommend Manchok to anyone looking to discover Bali at very reasonable prices where safety and professionalism are priorities. Thanks Manchok my friend for such an amazing time.Your friends from Wales and Spain Damian and Cristina!!!

Great expérience . Me and my familly had a great expérience with Griya ! We took Two tours with him! He is excellent ans safe driver with a lot of sens of humor ! But more importantly he like to share about his culture ( in a very good english) and give good advices about what to visite! He is very attentive and made us discover many things: food culture and landscape! I definitly recommand him as a guide!

Best driver and best day in Indonesia!!. We (3 people) spent the whole day with Manchok, driving from Ubud to Amed and visiting several places on the way. It was AMAZING, Manchok is such a good driver and a kind, nice and funny person! We had so much fun during the trip, I will never forget that day! I hope we can meet again and I highly recomend Manchok and Made Holidays to anybody. Masih mencintai kamu!! ;-)

Rio's Service was Awesome!. Waking up at 1am in the morning for a hike up Mount Batur was no joke. We even followed that by going for water rafting. It was tiring but Rio was great throughout the journey in the car. Making sure our belongings are taken care of and allowing us to sleep comfortably in the car while travelling.Thanks Rio!

Driver from Heaven. Awesome drivers! We hired them 3 different times and we were never dissapointed. All drivers were super respectful, very reliable, nice cars and great English spoken. They made our stay easier and safer than ever. If you just want to relax and enjoy sights with no stress this service is the best and also the most affordable private tour we have found. Thank you Made!

A Personal Guide to Paradise. We went with Made Holidays to Kawah Ijen from Bali and it was excellent. Tour guide Made and his son picked us up straight from the airport. The journey was pretty arduous (5.5 hr car ride, 1 hr ferry, 1.5 hr car ride again) but Made kept spirits up the entire way, cracking jokes, stopping along the way to pick up snacks and pit stops for food. His cheery and laid back disposition made us extremely comfortable, and he picked up the tab every single time (even when we tried to). The climb itself was lovely, although i recommend bringing trail mix/ snacks because we got cold and hungry at the summit. We were exhausted and barely conscious after a night of climbing but Made made the effort to stop by a local tourist attraction, a waterfall in one of the villages, which was a nice end to the trip.Do plan your next trip with Made Holidays, you won't regret it, trust me.

Great for tailored trips. I went to Ijen and Bromo with Made Adventures for a three days trip from Bali. Very professional and caring service, I suggest you do this trip with Made because it is very beautiful and well organized.

More than A driver. Travelling in Bali with Grya Astawa is the best way of being in contact with the heart of Bali. More than a driver, he really share the essence of his country.
Great Guide, very professionnel.

Great diver (guide). We had great time with Griya Astra during the whole day (it was a private tour we hired from made holidays).
More than a driver; he was a great guide. He made us explanations everywhere; it was really interesting! Good english to make communication easier.
We recommend to travel with him!
Thank you Griya :)

No need to look elsewhere- Made was the best tour guide we've had!!. I learned about Made through TripAdvisor. I messaged him via WhatsApp as I was interested in getting more info on attractions from Ubud. He responded very quickly and suggested I come to his tour stand to learn more in person. We ended up doing a customized tour to see several temples, and go to Virgin Beach one afternoon... Very convenient and easy to organize with him. His staff also had a sense of humor which I appreciate. My friend and I were traveling on a budget for our three week adventure-- Made explained many options in thorough detail and even told us how we could potentially go places without a tour by outlining the costs and transit associated. We ended up doing a 2 night/3 day tour to Kawah Ijen and Mt. Bromo through him too because all our experiences were so positive. It was absolutely a highlight of the trip to see the blue flames at Ijen and watch both sunrises. The drivers were all very friendly, one even bought us hats to stay warm at Bromo!! So thoughtful. The accommodations were comfortable. All in all, no complaints. Only glowing reviews. If I'm back in Ubud I would look no further than Made :-)
Good driver good price. i enjoyed my trip to Gitgit waterfall thanks to Dewa, his safe driving, good english and sociable character. Good boy thank you.Ettore

Friendly Trips. We had a great Jatiluwih rice terrace trip with Made Holidays today. Our driver Dewa DP was very friendly and smiley guy! Me and my wife liked and enjoy our trip very much. Thanks Made.

Perfect. I went to Bali with a friend, and we actually met by luck Griya Astra, who was a guide for Made holidays. We got along so well that the next morning we called him to ask him to take us on excursion. And a second time, and a third time. He was the perfect guide, the tours were great and impressive, he answered to our thousand of questions about Bali and his culture , took us also to non touristic places to show us something a bit different. With him we have seen and discovered things we probably would have never seen on our own or with someone else. If you book a tour with Made Holidays, ask for Griya.
Best driver was made mos. I have a nice drive on the time i stay in Bali,,,and my driver he is so good english speeking,,,and i will recomend my friend peter if he want a go to bali

The only driver I use in Ubud. I met one of the drivers from Made Holidays (his name is Griya) in 2015 when I was holidaying in Ubud. Some friends and I tried to negotiate a price to Canggu with various taxi drivers in the street and no one would budge on what seemed an expensive price, except for Griya. Based on his price and fun personality, we decided to use him. He was such a great driver and always offered a better price than everyone else, so I used him for the rest of my holiday in 2015 and of course got him to be my driver again when I was back in Ubud again in 2016.Griya is always reliable - he always shows up on time, is easy to communicate with on WhatsApp or via his local number, always gives you fair and good prices, is very fun and he has taught me a lot about Balinese culture. I highly recommend him.

Great experience with personal driver!. Me and my girlfriend spent 3 days with a personal driver, Made Surisna, around Bali.The formula was easy: you decide where to go, and they will drive for you. But it's not just like that: since the beginning Made helped us to plan at best our trip in Bali with a lot of suggestions and information. The driver was very nice and friendly, he explained a lot of Bali, so it was a great occasion to understand better the Bali spirit. He was very discreet, giving us our privacy during the visit and lunch time. We could decide how much time stay in every place. Then, after the first day together, Made understood what we liked more or less, and he suggested several place a little bit out of traditional tour, like local warung or real Balinese village. Great experience, do be done again with Made for sure.

Very friendly driver : Mr. Gede Rio. This is my first time came to Bali. I have no idea how to spend the time in here. I decided to check in "trip advisor", I found "Made holidays" tour. In three days I spent the time as the driver recommended to me. He gave me good tour in Bali. Also he very kind and friendly person.

Excellent days out. My husband and I spent two days with Surisna this week visiting various sites, temples, view points and generally journeying around Bali! On both occasions he picked us from one hotel and dropped us at our next accommodation which really helped make our time here more convenient and much more exciting! He was a full of great conversation, interesting facts and drove well! If I ever expressed amazement at a view he would stop the car and let us take a photo. Highly recommended!!

4.5 stars . If I could I would give them 4.5 stars. Our driver was super nice and a great driver and drove us everywhere we wanted BUT communication was difficult. When we initially booked with the owner we specifically asked for an English speaking driver. He assured us that although they weren't official guides the driver would be able to speak English and explain some of the cultural facts regarding the temples/sights we would go see. Unfortunately when we were picked up, the driver barely spoke English and admittedly the van had a faint BO smell. However, the driver was super friendly and nice and again knew his way around Bali.

Best guide service in recent memory!. Mouse picked us up from the airport for transport to Ubud and we knew he was a going to be a terrific guide. We booked him on a full day custom tour that he helped us plan and it was terrific! He has excellent English, a great goofy sense of humor, and a killer soundtrack that had us singing in the car all day. He even suggested additions to our itinerary that were highlights to the day. If you're staying at Puji Hostel or just browsing trip advisor for a good guide service look no further!

Great service, best prices, friendly and very helpful staff . Me and my boyfriend have stayed in Bali for 2 weeks, as we didn't have any plans, we just tried to search in Internet for any tour guides around Bali when we found Made website, he was just the second one on google search. And we are really happy that we found him, not only we took a couple of tours with him: jungle trekking, volcano, waterfalls and temples watching, we also rented a car for few days so as a motorbike, as we wanted to try to drive both on busy roads of Bali. Made is really positive, smiley and helpful person, so as driver, highly recommended!!! And the prices are the cheapest we've found. Wound definitely use his service again.

Very nice person and wonderful visits!. I have visited many places around Bali with Made and he was just super super nice. He was on time, always friendly and smiling, he drives nice and clean cars, and knows how to be patient with his clients:)Sure, I recommend his services!

great smile/ great service/ great cars. For some years we have rented a car, during holydays, from Made This year the Jimny we wanted to rent was allready in use. Made arranged an other (bigger) car with big discount for us. Again thank you Made!

“Very good price, probably the best on market; great service and valuable friendship. Totally stress free and no worries. We rented the car for one month and then for another 25 days more. The price was the very best on the market. We got a Suzuki Estilo, in good condition, plus free sim card I used for gps and the detailed road map of Bali. Everything was smooth. Communication was so excellent and we had no worries. We exchanged like dozens of emails and it was so stress free! I was really happy of finding Made. No payment before meeting. Made with his team waited us at the airport. We arrived late in the evening. As Made was returning to Ubud I just fallowed him so it was an easy driving for the fist time on busy Bali. Our son of 2 years and half was sleeping by the time we reached Ubud so I asked Made a favour: to get us to our location, close to Ubud. It was reliving to have had such big help, we reached our destination in no time. During the first rental period I had a broken tire so I used the spare until I met Made and he solved the problem with his money. And in the first days I got a mirror broken but Made gave me one of his member team to join me to a mega store for cars and I fixed the problem by having a new mirror at a low cost price. Oh, I got a big discount for the second rental period, I couldn't believe myself. Made was so nice and understanding and willing to help. Thank you so much Made! Greetings from me, my wife and our son! And see you soon. We highly recommend Made and his team, for price and service and friendship!

Friendly and very helpful. I rent a car with Made for my 3 month staying on Bali. Made is an amazing person. Fun and positive. He stays on the sunny side of life. He helped me a lot on Bali with the car and gave me lots of other helpful information. The price was very fair.
